recentChanges: Diaro is now more fun with an integrated Collage maker & a powerful image editor. Combine photos with amazing layouts into beautiful collages. Pick the layout you like best, edit collage with filter, sticker, frame, text & much more.
comments: Great app - been using it since 2012, and been a PRO user for a large chunk of that time. Love especially being able to use it both on my phone and in browser - can obviously type faster on the computer, although I do find the mobile interface faster. Today the website seems to not be loading tags or folders, but hoping that's a temporary issue! Edit: all working now, thanks!

I've been trying many journaling and diary apps in search of one that suits my needs. Being able to create different color coded sections with tags, entry dates, weather, and even a map of where I wrote the entry was really cool. It took me a little while to get used to it, but I did and I really like it. I need to keep track of many different things, and Diaro has been working the best for me. I love that Diaro backs up to Dropbox and synchs with all of my devices.

I have been a user of this app since 2015. What makes this app better than its many competitors is its excellent customer service! If you send them an email with a concern, they are on top of it with a quick response with a fix or to inform you that their working on it expediently yet apologetically. Great group of support staff!

I don't usually leave reviews, but this app is one of the exceptions. I really love writing and so I went to look for an app where I can pour all my ideas into. I found this app and I really loved it. The word count, folders, fonts and size adjustments are amazing. I find writing with this app really comfortable. Definitely would recommend.

A great electronic diary. After hand writing a daily diary for 30 years I finally went electronic in 2018. I love this app. It's really easy to use and backs up to Dropbox efficiently every night. The ability to save your diary into a Word document is brilliant. Wish there was the facility on the app to get a year's diary printed into a book professionally. That's the only thing I'd add. Addendum: I've been using this for two years. I still love it. It's never failed me!

title: Secret Diary with Lock 2020
description:
If you want to hide your personal feelings and memories from other and want to save them with a lock so that no one can read them. This Diary will provide you a protection to hide your all lovely and precious memories of your life. You can write here all your feelings and daily events that happen in your life.


Key Features of Diary->

1. There are multiple type of Locks(Pattern Lock, Password Lock, Number Lock) to keep your diary safe and secure from other.
2. You can add multiple Photos with each memory to make it so memorable.
3. Add music with each memory.
4. Facility to add more than one notes per day.
5. If you love painting there is a painting option to make drawing and add them with the note.
6. There are multiple type of fonts style to customize your diary according to your choice.
7. Choose font color according to your choice. No limit of font colors.
8. 10+ Amazing background to write note and you can also choose background from gallery also to make diary more beautiful.
9.  Attach emojies with each note to make it more beautiful. There is emoji keyboard available in diary.
10. 10+ attractive Themes to use in diary.
11. See your memories in list and calendar.
12. Share your memories with your friends on the Go.
13. Backup & Restore dairy to SD card.
14. Album option available to see all your diary photos and to share them.
15. Fully Customized Diary with much more features.
16. More than 25+ language support.

Backup and Restore Option->

In setting screen there is option to create back into SD card and restore from SD card of Diary. When You create backup of diary, Backup is created by the name of 'HandyDiarywithPassword' in the form of Zip File. This is created in internal Memory of phone.

When You restore this backup Diary in other phone , You need to copy this zip file from internal store of phone and paste internal device of another phone then click Restore Diary option from Setting. Your diary will be available in another device.


If you have any suggestion for us, You can tell us by sending mail. We will do our best to make diary much better for you.Please give app 5 star to support us on Play store.
descriptionHTML:
If you want to hide your personal feelings and memories from other and want to save them with a lock so that no one can read them. This Diary will provide you a protection to hide your all lovely and precious memories of your life. You can write here all your feelings and daily events that happen in your life.


Key Features of Diary->

1. There are multiple type of Locks(Pattern Lock, Password Lock, Number Lock) to keep your diary safe and secure from other.
2. You can add multiple Photos with each memory to make it so memorable.
3. Add music with each memory.
4. Facility to add more than one notes per day.
5. If you love painting there is a painting option to make drawing and add them with the note.
6. There are multiple type of fonts style to customize your diary according to your choice.
7. Choose font color according to your choice. No limit of font colors.
8. 10+ Amazing background to write note and you can also choose background from gallery also to make diary more beautiful.
9. Attach emojies with each note to make it more beautiful. There is emoji keyboard available in diary.
10. 10+ attractive Themes to use in diary.
11. See your memories in list and calendar.
12. Share your memories with your friends on the Go.
13. Backup & Restore dairy to SD card.
14. Album option available to see all your diary photos and to share them.
15. Fully Customized Diary with much more features.
16. More than 25+ language support.

Backup and Restore Option->

In setting screen there is option to create back into SD card and restore from SD card of Diary. When You create backup of diary, Backup is created by the name of 'HandyDiarywithPassword' in the form of Zip File. This is created in internal Memory of phone.

When You restore this backup Diary in other phone , You need to copy this zip file from internal store of phone and paste internal device of another phone then click Restore Diary option from Setting. Your diary will be available in another device.


If you have any suggestion for us, You can tell us by sending mail. We will do our best to make diary much better for you.Please give app 5 star to support us on Play store.

My Diary is an easy-to-use, free app that lets you save and store your own thoughts, memories, secrets, life events or other confidential information and sync them via Google Drive™ between all Android devices you use.


Key Features: 
- Create a password in the diary. 
- Reset password (security email address).
- Save, browse, search and share entries on your smartphone and tablet.

Please remember to perform synchronization regularly to avoid accidental data loss.

title: My Diary - Daily Journal & Diary with Lock
description:
About My Diary

My Diary app can be used as a Girl Diary or a Boy Diary.There is no age limit. Everyone can use it. Use as a Journal App. Use it as a Memoir and Memo Pad. It has a User Friendly Interface. Thanks to the 4 Digit Password Protection, your diary is safer. You can use the application in your language. You can export your diary as a PDF File.

A Lot of Themes

Customize your diary by choosing one of the themes for your spesific taste.

Customizable Text and Page

You can change text style, text font, text size, text color, page color, and day color.

Pin Lock

If you don’t want others to read your Diary entires you can set 4 digit password for your daily journal.

Beautiful Interface

My diary interface is very simple and eye catching. So, all age group can use it easily. There is no age limit.

Save as PDF

You can export your entires in your device as a PDF File.

Language Options

There are more than 10 language in My Diary.

Take Backup

To never lose your memories backup your journal entires. Restore them in a case of an accident.

How To Use My Diary

To add new page to your diary click to button on the right bottom of the screen. By clicking the button on the page you added you can add photo. First photo for the day on the list will be displayed on the main page. Add title and text to your diary page. Click the button on the top right button to customize the text and decide color for day. After you finish editing the page click top right button to save. You can edit all pages whenever you want. 
 Just click the list on main page. Go settings page through clicking the settings button on main page. You can change My diary app language. You can set password for your diary. You can save your diary as a PDF.


Contact

yappsmobile@gmail.com
https://www.instagram.com/yappsmobile/?hl=tr

Our themes and most images are designed by Freepik.

title: Diary, Journal, Notes - Universum
description:
Do you want to keep a diary of your own thoughts and feelings or finances or brilliant ideas or maybe a story of a trip in photos? Or maybe all at once? 

This diary is perfect to use as:

Classic private diary
Do you have lots of thoughts every day? Would you like to keep them just for yourself? Organize your thoughts and your life in your notes that you always have with you.

Travel journals
A travel diary or road journal is valuable documentation of a journey.

Diet journal
A food diary is a daily record of all food consumed as a means of tracking calorie consumption, weight loss or other nutritional monitoring.

Dream journal
Or dream diary is a private journal in which dream experiences are recorded for later analysis and possibly oneiromancy.

Mood tracker
Keep track of your daily mood and routines. It will help you discover causes of your ups and downs.

comments: I've been using this app since 2017. I purchased pro version and unlocked all features. Now, suddenly, I have to subscribe monthly just to get 1 GB of space. What happened to my money? Why did I even purchase this app? I can no longer use this app for a long-term period without paying monthly. I love Universum, so it breaks my heart to say this, but... you guys just lost a customer. I'm sorry. Universum was good, but now, it just cheated me of my money and time.

To developer, Hi, I wanted to ask why is my app having ads again? I already paid for this app. I appreciate your help ! Thank you in advance ! Edit: It's solved now ! Thank you for the help ! May I add something since I use this app like how I drink water everyday. Such simple and useful app. This is my basic essential for everyday use. I don't remember a day I wasn't using it. For the FINANCE/income/budget, is there a way the developer can add another input like BUDGET? Thank you a ton !

I like the layout of this app and it's easy and intuitive to use. You can add pictures, notes and various other things that I find less useful. But. As far as I can tell, you can't export your data in a format that is importable. And yes, you can sync your data with a cloud service, but you need to pay for a monthly subscription if you want to include your pictures. And I HATE subscriptions for software. I'm perfectly willing to pay a one- time fee. But not periodically. So no.
I like it , but add export to cloud, voice recording, doc scarner.
This app is great but there's one small problem. When you last updated this, all of my pictures disappeared.

title: Secret Diary: Easy and Safe to Keep a Diary
description:
Do you have a habit of keeping a diary?  With this secret diary app you can easily save your secrets, notes, events or important dates. Also you can set lock to keep others from snooping. You can choose a mood for each note.

This app is an easy-to-use well-designed diary app. It allows you to write your private diary and notebook conveniently, secure with a pin code or a pattern lock. It helps you to develop good writing habit and reminds you in time to keep a daily record about precious moments, such as happiness with your lovers, meeting with your friends, collaboration with your teammates, traveling during holidays, and so on and so forth. You can treat the app as a notebook, a task manager, or a trip journal as well. It also supports tracking your diary activity in a customized calendar view, and therefore you can easily traverse your diary histories at a monthly or daily basis.


Key Features:

★ Easily to start a journal with multiple mood types, such as silly, in love, happy, disappoint, sad, OK, surprised, angry, sick, etc.
★ PIN and pattern lock to keep your diary safe and private.
★ Insert pictures in your diary to save your best moments.
★ Beautiful calendar to organize your journals.
★ Daily notification reminder to remind you of writing, customize the reminder time as you like.
★ Easily creating, editing, saving and deleting diary notes.

Write a few words, take memorable pictures, and capture precious moments. Are you ready to start a new journey? Try this app and feel free to give us any feedback.

title: Secret Love Diary! Story Games
description:
Who is your secret crush? How are you feeling today? Who is your perfect match? Every girl has a dreaming diary for herself. Ava got a crush on her classmate Nate and wrote all her little secret in the magic diary! But she didn’t know how to tell Nate her feeling. This is her first love! Let’s help the sweetheart rewrite her destiny by dressing and styling her for Nate’s birthday party! Don't forget to lock your diary so no one can peek inside! Shhhhh...

- A romantic love makeover game for girls
- Knit the clothes, scarves and more! Show off your skills!
- Help Ava craft the most romantic love letter with cute patterns, lovely lip print for Nate 
- Create Ava the most beautiful look with tons of lovely outfits
- Choose endless different styles makeup with shining beauties on eyes, faces and lips
- Select various fabulous accessories to put on 
- Take sweet and funny selfies to remember the romantic moment with Nate

How to play: 
- Use interactive controls to play the game
- Use the key unlock the diary and start the game
- Take different beauty work for knitting, makeup, hair salon, dress up and love letter make
- Stylish Ava with endless choices with beauty tools as you want
- Various fabrics and patterns to make a knitting gift for Ava’s crush
- Write secret love letter, stamp it and send it to sweet Nate

Wanna have more fun? Having problems or suggestions? We would love to hear from you!

You can find us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/BearHugMediaPrincessGames 
Or on Twitter at https://twitter.com/bear_hug_media 
For more information about Bear Hug Media, please visit http://www.bearhugmedia.com
For more information about Secret Love Diary! Story Games, please visit http://www.bearhugmedia.com/secret-love-diary-story-games

title: Teddy Bear Diary
description:
Don't wait, live your life to the fullest, make some new memories today and don't forget to write everything down in your new Teddy Bear Diary! Personalize your phone with a free app and find a new best friend which will always be there, ready to listen, memorize and keep your secrets to itself. You can easily make numerous entries, make them personal with photos and emojis, choose one of the girly themes, colors, fonts... And many more customization options are waiting in this journal diary free app with lock with cute teddy bears! That's right, it has a lock function, so you don't have to fear that your mom or little brother will read your entries. Download your Teddy Bear Diary for free now, and write down all your secrets and events!


● Have a beautiful girly calendar!
● Make unlimited entries in your new journal notebook with lock!
● Easily create, modify or delete entries!
● Choose a theme color, font, paper style, first day of the week (Sunday/Monday)!
● Add photos or a mood emoji to each entry to give a special touch!
● Record audio and add it to your entry!
● Choose a language: English, German, Spanish, French, Hindi, Japanese, Portuguese, Russian, Serbian, Turkish, Italian and Korean!
● Search entries by date or keyword from the title or the text!
● Edit your old entries, in case you forgot to write something important!
● Set a daily, weekly or monthly reminder to write, just to keep it updated!
● Set a pin, pattern or safe lock and keep your secrets private!
● Add a recovery mail in case you forget your password!
● Reset, backup and restore your data!
● This app is integrated with Google Drive™, so you can save your notes to your own account! 
● Enjoy sharing secrets with your new best friend!

Our Teddy Bear Diary is not only a regular free diary app with password and teddy bear images; it is much more – a perfect diary notebook to write important thing to which you can add emoji and pictures, decorate the writings as you like, lock them with  pin, safe door or pattern lock, and save all the data to your account! Is it a “cool secret diary with a password and lock for girls” or what? Actually, since you can personalize it, it can be also a calendar diary for teenage girls or a boys diary to write in. Anyone who likes “teddy bear games” and is also interested in “phone personalization apps” will be more than satisfied with this cute diary entry writing app!

Open your app “Teddy Bear Diary” as soon as possible, and write your own diary for teenage girls! In that way you will include all the emotions related to the event, and tell your honest emotions and understandings. Our teddy bear app can give you that, and no one will read it, but you, since it is a “personal diary with password for girls”! When you feel like doing something creative, you can choose another “teddy bear background”, change fonts, paper style... Make use of this free teddy bear download, and get your own girls diary book with lock right away!

In the sea of “secret diary books for girls with lock with photos” can you find one with teddy bear themes for its pages? Other “diary games for girls free with locks on it” may be cue, but not as cute as our “diary with lock password for girls with pictures” of adorable teddy bears! Start phone personalization, get a daily diary to write memo, and enjoy your new diary games with a lock for a girl or boy. If you also have a wallpaper of teddy bear, it will match our “secret diary books for girls with lock” perfectly! Wait no longer, download Teddy Bear Diary and have great time with your new bff!

title: My Diary
description:
Use this diary app to make your own personal notes of daily events, appointments, secrets and feelings.

FEATURES:
• PIN code protection
• Emojis via Quick access keyboard
• Change font-style
• Reminder
• Easy to use
• Search
• Download backup (as text-file & pdf)
• Sync between devices

Build from the ground up to be simple and user friendly, the user interface is designed to allow you to enter new notes quickly and easily. 

With this Diary you can write all your private notes and secure them with a pin code.

Track and write about your daily activities.

Make it a habit to quickly write one or more mini-notes during your day. 

Simply leave a few words about your workout session, what happened at school or in the office during your day. 

In weekends, you can write about all the fun you had walking your dog, meeting with friends, or being social with your family. 

This can be the daily activity log you always have wanted. 

Make it your personal journal and have fun reading it over in few year, and share a few laughs with your friends. 

As this app is pure textual, and contains no images or photos, it runs ultra fast and smooth on any Android device, and consumes minimal of available memory and disk-space!

Setup a reminder to alert you when it is time to write. 

Protect all personal notes by adding a pin code when it starts up. 

Never worry about losing memories again. 

Easily send a backup of diary entries directly to email for extra protection.

title: Nutrition Diarrhoea
description:
The Nutrition Diarrhoea helps the patients to self-manage Diarrhoea trough nutrition, using interactive tools. This app gives the patient important information regarding the most common doubts about nutrition for patients with this condition in an understandable way. This app also allows the patient to know how many calories should be eating in order to maintain the weight. Another amazing functionality of this app is a food dairy where the patient can record the food eaten. The patient can then show these records to the doctor and together improve the patient’s quality of life.

Besides, the user can test its knowledge regarding Diarrhoea and nutrition in an amusing way through a little and fun quiz. 

Some information provided may not be valid for residents of other countries due to variations in medical practice and drug approval and indications.

This patient education application provides patients and Health Care Practitioners with easy to access information on Diarrhoea management.

Reserved only for BBD’s Partners.

title: Secret diary with passcode
description:
Beautiful yet discrete, this amazing secret diary was created to be simple and user friendly just so that you can focus on writing your day to day life story as it happens.
Either you want to keep your secret away from prying eyes, maybe a secret love story, or you just want to record your life's emotions as time passes, you now have a friend that listens to you without judging.
You have the chance to own an elegant secret journal which is always there for you when you want to confess or when you want to relive great moments of your life.

Lock all your secrets and take advantage of some great features that this diary offers you:

DIARY ENTRIES - EASY TO USE
 - see all your diary entries at a glance
 - beautiful main screen calendar with great overview
 - create, modify, delete entries in a very simple and intuitive way
 - add pictures functionality
 - possibility to choose suggestive moods for each entry
 - emoji support
 - journal timeline - see your all your journal notes for a certain time period
 - search functionality - search entries by mood or containing text

PASSWORD LOCK - PRIVATE & PROTECTED
 - set a password(PIN code) to protect your diary secrets
 - change password whenever you want
 - disable or enable password
  
CUSTOMIZATION
 - choose from different beautiful color styles/themes
 - choose from different text fonts
 - add, edit, delete moods - manage moods to best fit your emotions
 - add, edit, delete reminders - friendly reminder to write about your day
 - choose calendar first day of week (Sunday or Monday)
 - data reset functionality

A beautiful diary for your amazing stories and secrets.
Enjoy writing so that you can later relive your lifetime moments.

comments: Love this, it's great for diary people. It's well organized and has lots of simple features. One thing I would fix is finding a way for unfinished work to be saved. Sometimes when I accidentally exit, I go back in and my long paragraph about my life story for that day is all gone and I have to start over- which is frustrating. So that the only I would fix. One thing i think should be added on- if u take my suggestion- is an audio feature. Maybe so you can record voice and keep it in the entry.

I'm going to unfortunately have to quit use soon if this keeps up... In the middle of typing lately my keyboard will disappear, the all will flash and freeze while I type. Which is a shame because I've been using it for so long and it's only recently started doing this. :(

I just started using it today. I love it! Easy to use, I can change themes, easy lock, I can journal, make lists, add photos, etc.. 8/6/20- One huge con. No back up! I didn't look for it, after I started using it. I have a lot of entries, with a lot written in each one. If something happens to my phone, it's all gone, because I can't back it up. 9/16- new phone, and will have to copy& paste a lot of stuff...
It's pretty good. Simple. I like that.. Just wish you could personalize more. Don't like the color selection.. Too much pink and goldish yellow. Wish there was more calming colors or different pinks.
The reason the 2 Star Is because I switched phones and all my inputs are non - transferable... Other than that I LOVE IT, easy to use, hopeful THEY will listen and try to figure it out

title: CBT Thought Diary - Mood Tracker, Journal & Record
description:
Do you feel like you're always stressed, anxious, sad, frustrated, or unmotivated? The centerpiece of cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT) is learning to identify negative and distorted thinking patterns to change your emotions and your behaviors for the better. In CBT, a "thought record" guides you through the steps of identifying, challenging, and reinterpreting negative thinking patterns. With Thought Diary, you can document your negative emotions, analyze flaws in your thinking, and re-evaluate your negative thoughts into more balanced ones. It may even help you recognize helpful ways to deal with your negative behaviors and emotions for future situations.

CBT Thought Diary can do more than thought records, though! It can also be used as a daily mood tracker. You can even practice gratitude by creating positive entries using our flexible diary entry format. According to positive psychology, appreciating the positives in our lives can improve happiness and meaning.
 
With CBT Thought Diary, you can gradually change your approach to how you interpret the ups and downs of life, making long-lasting changes in your mental well-being.

According to positive psychology, practicing gratitude and recording positive emotions is important as well. Thought Diary also allows you to keep track of your positive experiences so that you can refer back to them and appreciate the good moments, as well as note down what particular things you're grateful for. This way, you can be more aware and thankful of the positive moments in life.

Thought Diary will help you evaluate, understand, and change your thoughts and feelings. By using this application, you can work to identify your emotions, analyze how and why you're feeling this way, challenge those negative beliefs, change your thinking patterns for future situations, and remember positive experiences. You can use this app as a mood journal, a thought record journal, and a gratitude journal.

Thought Records and Gratitude Journals similar to this app are commonly used in paper form in traditional cognitive-behavioral therapy for a variety of mental health disorders such as clinical depression and anxiety. If you are suffering from a mental health disorder, please consult a mental health professional or healthcare provider. 

Privacy Policy: https://cbtthoughtdiary.com/privacypolicy

Terms Of Service: https://cbtthoughtdiary.com/termsofservice

comments: I absolutely adore this app! The way it lays out each step for when you're feeling happy or sad helps you rationalize your thoughts in an easy way. The flexibility to add smaller entries, like mood, minor journal entries or full daily entries is welcomed. The only complaint is the pro edition costs WAY too much ($30/ yr) when the free edition already has more than enough. It's one of the best CBT apps out there, would highly recommend!

I downloaded this app with low expectations but I've been so pleasantly surprised at how amazing it is. The interface is simple and clean, helps you organize things very flexibly and I really love the "Check Thought" feature that allows you analyze how a negative thought may have a contortion and helps you find your wisdom in challenging the thought. 15/10 would recommend ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

this app is really good to have on hand. My friend uses this app frequently and recommended it to me. I may only use it once a month or so but catching that thought and being able to break it down in easy steps is really helpful. It's also makes it easier to go back and remind yourself of those descions and the thought process, highly recommend.

I like the simplicity of the app. It's not overwhelming to look at. The layout makes it easy to use. I would give it 5 stars, but I feel that an app helping teach CBT skills through journaling should have more features available without needing a premium version.

A good app for keeping track of your thoughts and worries. The only detraction is that some features are locked behind a premium service. Since using the app I have been able to keep better track of my mood and thoughts as well as notice patterns in my behaviours I wouldn't have otherwise. A great choice for anyone utilizing CBT or anyone looking to gain a better understanding of themselves

title: Offline Diary
description:
Want to keep a diary, but don't trust it online? Offline Diary can be used for a personal diary, work journal or note taking. You can use it keep lists for Christmas, birthday or even grocery shopping lists too!



Features
- Simple and easy to use interface
- Password protected
- Android Material Design inspired
- Custom themes

In-app purchases:
- Backup/Restore and Wordpress Import/Export
- Remove ads
- Several different theme packs

summary: Keep a diary. Keep it offline. Keep it safe.
developerAddress:
Mike Hall
7601 Interactive Way
Indianapolis, IN 46278
recentChanges:
- Fixed bug where entries would sometimes lose their list items after saving with auto-save enabled
- Android library updates
- Fixed bug where sometimes a duplicate entry is made after switching apps, then switching back and making changes with auto-save enabled
- Make security questions answer text boxes single line
- Hid the details of the list and entry views when you switch away from the app if you have a password or PIN, so that entries aren't exposed until the app is unlocked
comments: I love this app. I'm using it to take note of the stuff that catches my interest in my history course this year. I make a journal entry with an easy title, specify the particular item which interests me, jot a couple noted about my initial thoughts on it, and save links to relevant resources. This is going to be an excellent tool as I continue stydying.

This is about the best app I found for Diaries. it is fairly easy to use . although it could be more specific in regards to savings and storage. I bought the backup up diary mode and appreciate it since I have used it quite a bit. so all in all yes I would definitely recommend this app.

Very versatile, using the date as the first part of the entry makes it easy to track. Initially used it for contact tracing my movements during the each day. Now the country has its own app, it was simple to switch to normal journaling.

I don't know if it's the device I'm using but for some reason the thing so I could delete something isn't there it just has the lock thing and the " Choose sort order" Thing But I still think it's a great app I use it to write a lot of stuff like notes for class on zoom I really do recommend it to anyone who just likes to write stuff 👀

Great app. The instructions on backing up your Diary is a little confusing and unclear so, that's one improvement that can be made. Also, adding a 'Search function' to help find previous entries would be an idea to consider.

title: Reflectly - Journal / Diary
description:
** JOURNAL APP TO LEARN SELF-CARE AND HAPPINESS **

How you are feeling on a daily basis matters. Reflectly is a personal journal and diary driven by artificial intelligence to enable you to deal with negative thoughts, make positivity louder and to teach you about the science of well-being. 

Be prepared to reduce stress, get perspective, develop gratitude and learn to apply empathy and kindness to every aspect of your life. 

Reflectly uses positive psychology, mindfulness and cognitive behavioural therapy to make you thrive in life and to give you the personal tools and mindset to overcome negative thoughts and build a habit of positivity through a journal into your life.


** SAY HI TO US **

We'd love to connect with you to hear about your Reflectly experience. Please don't hesitate to reach out to us on social if you have any feedback or questions:

• Facebook - https://facebook.com/reflectlyio/
• Instagram - @reflectlyapp
• Twitter - @reflectlyapp

.. or send us an email at hello@reflect.ly :)

recentChanges:
Update, ahoy!

This update includes a bunch of new motivational quote categories. Also allows for "favoriting" the quotes you love the most!

We hope you love these new additions to Reflectly. Tell us what you think by leaving a review! :)
comments: I love this app a lot! I use it daily and it really helps to write down my feelings. Especially when I just feel like when I can't tell anyone. And plus the the quotes are very motivational and true. I love it! The reason why I didn't put 5 stars is because there is a lot of stuff not worth paying for that much for the premium thing. And I feel like there is too many features locked for premium that I can't do anything.

I love this app. My favourite thing is that it gives you a routine based on your mood. Its great for if you feel a bit down too and you can see your progress in happiness. In July I had saved mine as "stressed because of school" and now I'm happier than ever! Defo recommend 5☆ from me!

Reflectly is such a great app! You can add multiple moods and activities for each day, there are also quotes, you can choose what quote style you want for different things you are struggling with or things you just need to hear. I highly recommend this app!

Really terrible experience. I applied for account.paid 1 months fee, completed stupid tutorial and before email creation hit back. Because I don't want to create this account. And now I'm stuck on trial account, but I lost 1 months fee. I'm totally disappointed. Stupid tutorial, stupid app, stupid idea! Return my money!!!

I know this app is good because my friend showed me it and after time he was feeling great thanks to this so i wanted to try too, but before i could create my account it didnt let me tick the TERMS OF PRIVACY box and i wish that you could fix it please. But otherwise this app is great according to my friend.

title: Endive - IBS FODMAP Food Diary & Symptoms Tracker
description:
Simply track what you eat, your symptoms and moods and Endive will help you identify correlations in a visual graph form.

Food is a common trigger of digestive symptoms. Avoiding certain foods or keeping a low FODMAP diet can dramatically improve issues like gas, bloating, stomach pain, diarrhoea, constipation and others.

However, everyone is different and there is no one-size-fits-all IBS diet: Keeping a diary of what you eat and how you feel is vital to learning what triggers your symptoms.

Take charge of your digestion and gut health.

📉PERSONALISED TRACKER 
Add custom foods and symptoms that are personal to you and track them together with the others. Endive knows recipes and breaks them down into ingredients to make IBS tracking faster and more efficient.

If you have a condition you know about, but want to optimise your diet to help improve your symptoms, Endive helps you keep track of what you have eaten and how you feel, both physically and psychologically. This allows you to learn how your body reacts to different foods 🥑, or which triggers (e.g. anxiety, depression) are causing you symptoms.

📊WIDE RANGING TRACKER

Endive helps you manage conditions such as:

✅ IBS (Irritable Bowel Syndrome)
✅ IBD (Inflammatory Bowel Disease)
✅ Food intolerance and sensitivities (such as Dairy, Wheat/Gluten, Lactose)
✅ Acid reflux
✅ Crohn’s disease
✅ Coeliac disease
✅ SIBO (Small Intestinal Bacterial Overgrowth)
✅ Ulcerative colitis
✅ Migraines & cluster headaches
✅ Skin issues (such as Eczema, Acne)
✅ Period / menstrual cycle related issues
✅ Bloating, heartburn, and many other digestive conditions

🔬FODMAP TRACKER
Want to track your FODMAP diet? 🍒
FODMAP’s are types of carbohydrates that are poorly absorbed by the body. Studies show strong links between them and digestive IBS symptoms. A low FODMAP diet can have remarkable benefits if you struggle with these issues.

If you want to take your tracking to the next level, get weekly reports with Endive Plus that highlight high and low FODMAP foods in your diet so you can learn which of them might have caused your symptoms.

————————————————

We'd love to hear your thoughts 💭

💡Send your questions, feedback and bug reports to feedback@endive.app

comments: Helpful for keeping track of food and symptoms but definitely not an app for a newbie. New to having to keep an eye on FODMAPS so wish it was easier to see which was what. There is the ability to pay for highlighting of this but I didn't find the highlights were on each food item. As well, the food options assume you're making things from scratch. Or some searches food items just didn't result in anything and I had to manually add each ingredient. Definitely not gonna be doing that takes forever

I've used several apps to track my IBS-C. I know the developer is still working on this app, but so far I like it. They have a great selection of food items and recipes already in the database. You can easily adjust the recipes, too. After every entry it asks you to rate your triggers (bloating, constipation, etc) which I LOVE! I'm so bad about tracking those. There is no export option yet, which I hope comes soon. Using the free version and there are no ads, either.

Found this app really disappointing. The high/low fodmap scoring is behind a paywall. Additionally I lost confidence in the food directory, hardly any of the meals I get from the supermarket are in the directory.
User experience is just really cluttered. I looked for my regular low fodmap items in the meal directory and could not find any of them. Going to keep looking for a helpful fodmap food diary
I use it for my IBS and how bloated I am etc good reminder.

title: Diary - Journal with password
description:
Secret thoughts and moments should always remain secret and a private diary should always be intimate, beautiful and safe. With that in mind, we dedicated our efforts to create a simple and beautiful diary application that helps you lock your secrets with your own password. 

Use this diary and put down all your thoughts or even future plans and follow them as the time passes. Make it your trustworthy friend who never judges you and who's always there for you.

A good diary required good features, so here are some of the great features especially created for you:

EASY TO USE & BEAUTIFUL
 - very easy to use yet very comprehensive
 - beautiful view off all your notes right on the main screen
 - easy navigation between your diary entries
 - image add/edit/remove functionality
 - image library with great gallery view
 - great overview of your daily entries
 - quick entry add, edit & delete
 - beautiful emojis(emoticons) - highlight your mood and feelings
 - search functionality - quickly & easily search through your journal
 - export to PDF functionality - save all your entries whenever you want
 
SAFE & PRIVATE - PASSWORD PROTECTED
 - password lock functionality to keep your secret save
 - 4 digit PIN code
 - functionality for password update, recovery and removal
 - auto lock after more than 5 minutes of inactivity 
 
CUSTOMIZABLE
 - multiple color styles from which you can choose
 - multiple font styles
 - customizable font-size
 - reminders functionality
 
OTHER COOL FEATURES
 - data reset functionality
 - beautiful design
 - can be easily used as a diet journal or even travel diary
 - totally free 
 
Regardless you want to write your love story or you just want to write down your thoughts and moments from your life, we hope this diary will turn out to be your best friend and confidant.
 
Enjoy your life and create amazing stories!

comments: The only reason I don't rank this five stars is because it has the issue of freezing when I have anything else running in the background. On the other hand, I'm grateful that my files were restored after they had been deleted, because I regretted deleting everything from this app when I lost the PDF file of my original entries. This diary has been my best friend for six months.

Love this app! The style is customizable and the visuals are cute! I use this alot for creative writing, it's also pretty good for the privacy it offers. It has barely any ads and no pop ups. My only complaint is that, if you're writing and then you leave the app for long enough, all of your previous writing will delete itself.

Your app is good and I've not had any issue with it until I tried to open it recently with my password but it's not opening. I also tried the forgot password option no link was sent to my Gmail. Even though I sent a complaint to your mail few days ago I've still not gotten any response yet. Please I'd like if this can be rectified soonest. Thanks

This app is very easy to use and excellent app with no complaint. This app also has full respect for privacy. but just one flaw which outweigh all its excellency. If I change my phone, what will happen to my saved data or saved diary entry? Please guide as there's no feature to the same. If there's no update or guidance on this, then I am changing my phone cos writing your deep thoughts and losing it, it's waste of time.

I can't log in with my password. No matter how, just can't login. Opening just need to passward to enter. How to resetting and login, please advice me. I was read many people have write in about the password, cannot login. And I didn't see any reply from your app. Please advise me. Thanks

title: Easy Diary
description:
All the sources of the Easy Diary are released to github.
https://github.com/hanjoongcho/aaf-easydiary

Easy Diary does not collect or store your personal information.
If you use the Google Drive Backup feature, your Realm Backup File will be stored in the drive of your account, but it will not be collected or saved externally because it is stored in your account.

[Features]
01. Writing diary (voice & keypad)
02. Diary search
03. View & List Diary
04. Edit your diary
05. Diary backup and recovery
06. View timetable diary creation status chart
07. View a list of diaries in your calendar
08. Lock diary
09. Attach Photos
10. Font Setting

[Request Permission]
01. WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
02. READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE

comments: I can not find the option to change the font.

Avoid! I had only used the app for a few weeks, then I found i had to clear and reset my phone, no problem I thought as I had already set this app to backup. On restore it found a backup but when loaded it appeared to be someone else's! It certainly wasn't my data. Im very annoyed as I've never used a diary before so for me to start one at my age was a big step. I can only recommend NOT to use this app. response, I know I'm not stupid, it was set via your app but the backup found wasn't mine!

It's a nice and cool diary app, I was looking for such an app. Thanks for this nice, clean app. Just wanted to say, that some of the prompts are not in English, I guess they pop-up in Korean language, whenever they ask for any permission. So please keep a look on the languages used on the pop-up. Overall a nice and cool app.
The Google drive backup causes app to crash
App works very well. I highly recommend.

title: Diary free app with lock
description:
A beautiful personal diary app to save personal notes. Diary app with password in english 

New: Dark Mode in settings ! Compatible also with Android Q 

Style your diary app itself !!
- Choose your own avatar, username, header image and even your own image for the background in the pasword screen can you choose. Custom colors can also be defined.

Features:

New:
- Fingerprint Authentication for all Smarphones that support it
- Set your own wallpaper (instead of white)
- Categories can be sorted
- Notes can be eported as a text file (All or by category)

- Individual notes can be encrypted with 256 bits. Never forget the password you have entered  !!! It is not stored in the app.
-New: Multifotos ! Add unlimited photos to your note now. You can slide images from right to left or left to right. Click on a single image to open the options menu !
- Notes widget (new)
- Voice Recorder included 
- Recording of videos is possible now 
- Diary with lock. You can enter your own password to protect your data.
- Users of Samsung Galaxy Smartphones can log in via fingerprint lock when supported by the smartphone.
- You can add a location to a note.
- A photo can be added to a note.
- A drawing app is integrated with. You can also load images with the app
- Handwriting font can be activated
- Voice to text is integrated (voice to text via Google)
- A QR code scanner is integrated with the app
- SMS can be imported into a note
- Notes and pictures can be shared via WhatsApp, Gmail and other services
- You can create your own categories with many different colors and icons.
- Important notes can be saved as favorites
- The diary app can receive notes and images from other apps. Prerequisite is that this is supported by the other app. For example, Import notes from another Diary app
- Diary entries can be printed via HP-ePrint. The HP-ePrint app must be installed.
- A simple PDF file can be created.
- Text files can be imported into a note

- You can back up your data back. All data such as photos, videos, etc. are stored in the / DiaryBackup folder on your smartphone. It is recommended to create a backup from these folders from time to time.

Boys & Girl diary with password for secret notes.

You can also use the Diary app as a simple notes app. Diary free with many features. You can also purchase a Pro version.

Privacy is integrated into the app. There is no own side to this app !!

Secret Diary with Pass Lock

- A simple PDF file can be created.
- Text files can be imported into a note

- You can back up your data back. All data such as photos, videos, etc. are stored in the / DiaryBackup folder on your smartphone. It is recommended to create a backup from these folders from time to time.

Boys & Girl diary with password for secret notes.

You can also use the Diary app as a simple notes app. Diary free with many features. You can also purchase a Pro version.

Privacy is integrated into the app. There is no own side to this app !!

Secret Diary with Pass Lock

title: Cara Care: FODMAP, IBD, IBS Tracker, Poop Tracker
description:
Cara Care takes the mystery out of your digestion. It’s the easiest way to holistically manage and track GI issues like IBS, IBD, GERD, Celiac, dyspepsia, or food intolerances.

Track and log your poop, stress, food, pain, and other symptoms (e.g. from IBS) with just a few taps. 

The app shows you what your food and symptoms are on your best and worst IBS days.

Start making connections between your diet, your gut, and your overall well-being.

Cara Care’s premium 12-week IBS program is your personalized guide to following the low FODMAP diet. You’ll get unlimited text chat with a personal dietitian helps you every step of the way in navigating your IBS and beginning low FODMAP. Based on 5,000+ hours of nutritional counseling with people who have IBS. 

-------

UNLIMITED ACCESS TO OUR BEST IN CLASS IBS TRACKER AND POOP TRACKER

🍜 Food Tracker: Save time by adding your favorites and photos if you follow low FODMAP, gluten free, or other diets
🧻 Poop Tracker: Log different types of bowel movements
📋 Symptom Tracker: Track bloating, constipation, diarrhea, pain, and other IBS symptoms
🩺 Medical Log: Record important information about your period, skin, workouts, sleep, pain, and medication

PERSONALIZED ANALYSIS

✅ Food on your best and worst days is shown in your dashboard 
✅ Share your app data easily with your primary care provider or gastroenterologist
✅ Access a library of actionable, science-based tips for living with IBS
✅ Low FODMAP recipes

MAKE LIFE WITH IBS EASIER: JOIN A 12-WEEK IBS LOW FODMAP PROGRAM

👩‍⚕️ Free unlimited text chat with your personal dietitian
📊 Get personalized analysis on your symptoms and diet from your dietitian
🥣 Follow a self-paced, 12-week action plan for the low FODMAP IBS diet  
🔬 Get science-backed tips on managing IBS, with actionable takeaways at every step
📝 Track your progress with medically-validated questionnaires 

CARA CARE USER PHOEBE SAYS:

"With Cara Care, for the first time I had the feeling that someone wanted to help me. Thanks to the program, I felt much better! Of course there are problems here and there, but I have made a lot of progress and can enjoy eating again." – Phoebe

NOT JUST FOR IBS. 

Cara Care is designed for people with chronic gut conditions such as irritable bowel syndrome (IBS), and IBD (Crohn's disease, ulcerative colitis and microscopic colitis). But Cara Care’s symptom tracker can also help you with:

• Bowel problems such as acid reflux, dyspepsia, nausea, chronic abdominal pain, bloating, irritable bowel syndrome (IBS) with symptoms such as chronic bloating, abdominal pain, constipation and diarrhea
• Short bowel syndrome, small intestinal bacterial overgrowth (SIBO), gastritis, celiac disease
• Diets such as gluten-free, fructose-free, histamine-free and lactose-free, clean eating, healthy eating, keto
• Food intolerances and sensitivities such as dairy, lactose, cow's milk allergy, fructose, histamine, gluten/wheat
• Leaky gut syndrome & Candida albicans
• Period/menstrual cycle-related digestive problems

We would ❤️ to hear from you.

Send your questions, suggestions, and feedback to hello@cara.care
Find us on: https://cara.care

comments: Great While It Lasted. I really thought I had found the perfect app to track my symptoms. I spent a huge amount of time entering info. Then, I made the mistake of logging out. Now it won't let me log back in. It says it's sending me a confirmation email to restore my data. But I'm not getting it. I've tried a dozen times & checked my spam/junk folder a hundred times. I'm not receiving the email. I'm so very disappointed. I haven't found another app that covers so much detail. :-(

Adding food and meds can be tedious as a lot of options aren't available. This makes sense as the developer is based in Germany and I live in the US. I also don't add each ingredient, because so many foods have some degree of salt or oil, and those show up in the "best/worst ingredients," even though I know those aren't my triggers. I think the most irritating part is that when I add "no poop" so I can log symptoms, it shows in the report that I pooped. Still a mostly useful app.

I like the idea of this, especially the food tracker to see what foods may be causing me trouble. The only really frustrating part is also the food tracker. They only seem to have half the things I try and put in and it really isn't that user friendly with that function either. The rest of it works pretty well so, despite the food tracker being what I really wanted, I mostly just record symptoms which, in itself, is still helpful.

Great app and is very detailed with a nice user interface. My only critism is when adding pictures to food - it automatically offers to crop or zoom in a landscape rectangle and you can never get the full thing you want in the picture as you can only get part of it. It would be better if it was free crop or zoom within a certain squared area, not a landscape rectangle. An option to export to excel would also be great.
The UI experience is bad and not intuitive. I found it frustrating to use.

title: Chiku – Journal / Diary & Mood Tracker
description:
Introspect on daily events with self care journal to lead a happier life. We often find it
demanding to maintain a personal diary or mood journal and write about our
feelings. Yet, keeping our precious moments and memories safe for a lifetime is
what we aspire. Log your emotions and create a story anytime, anywhere using
Chiku – Personal Diary & Daily Mood Tracker.

Emotion Tracker
Give some time to yourself, for your well-being. Taking out a few minutes daily from
your busy, stressful schedule and just wondering about how your day was, is the key
to a healthy mind. Think about what made you feel happy and why something did
not. Log your emotions in the happiness tracker or reason about why your daily life
has become so stressful. Chiku is your personal assistant and emotion tracker to help you keep track of your day-to-day activities and inspire you along the way to
keep making your life better.

Mental Health Journal
Find your mental health score. We rate your daily mood and feelings to generate a
score averaged over a period of time, that tells how well you are keeping. Stay
elevated, keep a high score. Also, have a look at your top feelings, moods and
activities over the last few days.

Read Quote Of The Day
Get a daily dose of quotations, challenges, and questions. Start your day by reading
quote of the day that motivate you to achieve great things in life and guide you to live
a more meaningful life. Take Challenges that spark a competitive spirit in you and
feel a sense of accomplishment when you fulfil them. Explore the self care journal to
answer questions that force you to rise above petty issues and ponder over more
important stuff in life.

Mood Journal and Mood Diary
Get in-app blogs and be a part of the mood diary community. Connect with others
like you anonymously through our Community Platform. Share what you feel on
various topics with mood journal discussions. We believe that it’s easier to face
challenges in life when we have someone to talk to and get support from like-minded
people.

Self-care journal is available in 6 languages: English, Hindi, French, German, Italian
and Spanish.


Features of Chiku – Personal Diary & Daily Mood Tracker

★ Log your mood, feeling, activities and write about your day in mood journal.
★ Graphs & Interesting Insights to make mood diary more appealing
★ Configure reminders to create a story daily in self-care journal
★ Get a daily dose of motivation in the form of quotes, questions and challenges.
★ Increase your security by enabling emotion tracker app lock
★ Draw or add images and add them to your story
★ Use Happiness tracker to log your feelings
★ Read in app blogs and quote of the day about mental health
★ Join a community of like-minded people and mood journal keepers.
★ Multiple mood diary Themes to personalize your diary.
★ Dark mode available for mental health journal

Are you looking for a useful and life-changing self care journal app? 
The new emotion tracker and mental health journal is here for you. 

Download and use Chiku – Personal Diary & Daily Mood Tracker today!

comments: I payed for a month just to try it out fully. It's a very pleasing app to use, the ui looks very elegant and it actually feels like Chiku is asking me questions rather than me just ranting onto the paper. The o ly complaints I have are that it's going to be a massive pain to scroll to old stories and I feel as though the daily reads (for me) aren't too useful. Really great app! I'm considering buying the lifetime plan hoping this app doesn't get discontinued.

Very nice app. It's more than an app. It's a safe space🌌. Meditation is very nice. The quotes are very good of course!! Im in love with this app. The themes are all so good. Writing here is so easy!! Love it.
Easiest app to use. It is enough options to declare all your feelings and mood conditions, also, if you want you can add a written description about what's going on.
This app is amazing. I love how it reminds you to add a new story every day. Idk how to explain but everything is perfect.

I'd like to visit my previous entries with more ease. Please let me view them more easily without having to scroll sideways a lot. Also a go-to feature where you can find specific entries besides the filter would help. Also it would be nice to be able to save community blogs and daily quotes that inspired you. Maybe save them somewhere so you can access them any time. I also have experienced difficulty downloading the pdf versions of my entries.

title: Diary – Write Journal, Memoir, Mood & Notes book
description:
Diary – Write Journal, Memoir, Mood & Notes book is a pin code password protected personal journal app that you can use to write down good memories or private notes. Use our lovely emojis and smiley faces for a daily mood tracker or keep photo memories of your life journey. Diary with a lock will keep your memoir notes book safe using a security code. Personalize the journal by choosing the theme and a custom font style. Sync with Dropbox or Google Drive to keep your diary entries accessible on all your devices or export it as a PDF file to print it.


Diary – Write Journal, Memoir, Mood & Notes features:

🔒 Password protection – Lock and protect your private notes and diary entries with a PIN security code.

🎨 Themes and Font style – Personalize diary by picking one of our themes and by setting a custom font style.

☁️ Google Drive or Dropbox Sync and Backup – Backup your journal entries and never lose your memories. Use Dropbox sync to transfer your notes to another device, or restore them in a case of an accident.

😍 Emojis and Mood tracker – Express yourself using lovely emojis and smiley faces. Track mood by choosing appropriate emoji every day.

🖼️ Photo journal – Keep your photo memories by adding photos to your diary entries. Those can be travel photos, group photos with your friends or any private photos that you want to keep secure under PIN code.

🔔 Reminder – Set a daily reminder to write diary. Never forget to make notes of your mood, emotions, thoughts or future plans.

🔎 Search and Organize – Sort your note book by date or name and search through your memoir to find those records that you want to remember.

comments: I just rated this a few days ago. Idk why they asked me to rate it again. Anyways, I like the convenience, Iike how straightforward and uncomplicated the app is. Also like the pink theme (love pink) and the fact that theres a pin code so that only YOU can read your secrets! Only thing I kinda hate is the fact that you have to save your note yourself. It doesn't automatically save it for you. Hope ya remember to save it or it will get deleted. Other than that, it's pretty good.

Love this app because of it's total simplicity and lack of intrusive ads. Easy to navigate, easy to add new entries and to go back if you've skipped a day. Doesn't have all the bells and whistles of other apps, but I find this makes it quicker and easier to keep it up-to-date. Definitely going to get the pro version just for the emojis!

The only problem I encounter every time I try to restore my backed-up data is that it shows no dialogue that the restoration process is finished. I just estimate the time required to restore, and then when I go back, it's all there, perfectly restored. The problem is that it doesn't show the progress of the restoration, nor does it show the end screen that the restoration is completed. (The restoration itself works fine though.)

So far so good. Wish it had more themes and emojis. I know when you purchase more is offer but even that is a limited variety. Also wish I could do my pages different colors so I can categorize my journal. All in all good app thanks guys🤗 Sorry one more thing. How do I go in setting and change the tone format?

It is easy I write in this app. Seven months into lockdown, I have just started writing, and since I anticipate it will be at least a year before there is an effective, safe vaccine, I am glad I found this as a way to record my thoughts. The biggest negative aspect of the lockdown is the dire restriction on social connections with other people, and I am concerned about of such continuous isolation.

title: Bladder Diary by iUFlow
description:
iUFlow app is a bladder diary on your mobile. Download to track and monitor toilet trips.
"Bladder diary by iUFlow" is a fully automated voiding and stool diary. 4.8⭐
It is FREE and UNLIMITED Toilet diary 🚽 
(also known as incontinence tracker 🚾,
pee log ✔ bladder runpee and stool log 🧻).

Urine tracker enables the recording of intake and output (urine). Trace your Bladder activities, as well as recording bowel movement - poo - using a Bristol chart (normal, constipation, diarrhea etc) for a digestive tracker and poo journal. 

Keep track of your bladder and bowel movements easily on your phone, then easily share the diary with your doctor. A complete urine log or a bathroom log is a basic source of data for treatment and will be very appreciated by your health provider. 

Some use iUFlow bladder diary as a comfortable water/urine reminder during the time of completing a 72hr urination bladder diary.
The app further allows the automation of the urine measurement by using the iUFlow device which is an optional item.
 
The iUFlow device is currently for selected clinics and can be pre-ordered.

A detailed BD may be important and useful for health issues related to prostate enlargement, renal failure, kidney transplant, urinary incontinence, Lower Urinary Tract symptoms (LUTS).

recentChanges:
Thanks for using iUFlow. Your support is appreciated!

We're listening to your feedback and working hard to improve iUFlow. Here is what's been added to the latest version:
- Removed permission requests
- Better support for night monitoring - incl. option to mark First morning pees and show Nocturia parameters
- poo log + pee log = full toilet tracking
- Improved performance and stability
- Customize drink volumes
- Bad bugs control


Please let us know what you think!
comments: I was asked to keep a track of my intake of liquids and record when I go to the toilet by a health professional to see what is causing me issues. This app allows you to record when and what you drink and also if you leak and how urgent it is to need to go to the toilet. This app will be good to maintain and monitor that going forward.

This app was able to help me see the potential health problems I was haven that went unnoticed before! After about 2 months of recording, I was able to visit my doctor with documentation when trying to explain my symptoms. Along with a food/exercise tracking app installed around the same time along with good record keeping, my doctor was able to pinpoint my exact cause of symptoms and was able to point me in the right direction for overall better personal health care!!!

Exactly what I needed. Extremely simple. No ridiculous bells and whistles that only a physician would need. My only request would be an easier way to get back from the diary to an entry and reverse. A little old school to have to back out of one to get to the other. Great job. Please keep it simple guys ...too many over complicated over thought apps out there.

Easy to record urine flow and liquid intake. Just enter the volume and your observations. Time of the activity is automatically recorded. Keeps a time wise diary which can be exported by pdf to a mail ID. It will help you and your doctor to monitor any issues. Very easy to use.

Very effective and easy to use. I am not sure I would say I love using it to track all bladder movements, but if you need to do this, this is definitely the no-nonsense, easy-to-use tool to do it. Data export is easy and effective, allowing you the opportunity to throw real data back at your urologist. Oz to ml conversions on the fly, drink size presets, and ability to note characteristics for each entry are features I use. This app owns.

title: Luna diary - journal on the moon
description:
How to use
■ Express the mood of the day as the moon.
■ As you use a diary, the number of flowers and stars increased.
■ The state of the moon changes according to the number of diaries written in the last 30 days.
■ Keep your photos, videos and music in your diary.
■ Diary with lock - Password and finger print.
■ A moon shape widgets.
■ Various themes

If you have any problems or suggestions, please feel free to contact us by email

■ READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
Permission to add photos, music, and video files in the repository.

■ WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
Permission to save backup files and shared images.

summary: Tell the moon your feeling you never told anyone.
comments: I just bought the premium version of this app because it gives me a simple, enjoyable, peaceful place to write down short poems that I can back up (as text files) onto my Google Drive so I never lose an idea. This was the first app I tried to journal when I decided to get a mobile phone and I'm a loyal customer because it doesn't need to change, it's simplicity and friendliness, graceful aesthetic make it a genuinely dependable, wonderful go-to app that services serenity. We need more of it

I really love the calming background music and the moon aesthetic. Love writing in this journal app every night. However, I couldn'y attach music to my entries anymore. What happened? It was one of the reasons I downloaded the app, because you could photos AND music to your entries. Please fix this. ☹️ Other than that, it's a wonderful writing app for someone with anxiety like me. It makes me feel like I'm telling the moon my secrets. 🌙💕

I love this app. I literally write on it as a form of therapy but as I was writing today I couldn't attach music or pictures. I managed to attach a video but well the app crashed on me several times before then. Please fix this. This feature is what I like the most.

I have downloaded the app and it's amazing! But there is a problem I face with the app..... I'm not able to attach images. I was able to do so once but since then I haven't been able to attach any files..... Please try fix this!! I would really love to attatch images and other stuff to my diary entries but I'm unable to do so!

I haven't written anything in forever. But when I opened the Luna Diary. The words and emotions just slipped out. This is an extraordinary app, like something made out of heart and soul. This app is like something that breathes. It's a gem. I hope it stays forever. Kudos to the developer, you're amazing and beautiful! Here's to more updates!

title: Diary
description:
My Day Diary is an easy-to-use free app that lets you save and store your own thoughts, memories, secrets, life events or notes. You can sync and backup all yours memories on My Day Server, so you can access your memories across all your Android devices. What’s more, you can share your memories with your friends or family! 

Key Features: 

- Simple to use
- Full offline functionality
- Password secured
- Simply calendar navigation 
- Share with others
- Reset password (security email address).
- Save, browse, search and share entries on your smartphone and tablet. 
- Sync data 
- Backup & Restore
- Notifications

description:

Have fun writing :)

Nice app. But picture is really blurred. Emojis are blurred. You can also add options like reset password in case someone forgot. You can add an option of create account. And what is that gift option? It closes the app every time I touch it.
This app is actually really good and also i love the privacy system And the writing style and you can whatever the heck you want
I just love 💘 ❤ this app it has no ads And I can keep my all secrets inside it and there is a password of anyway and this is the best app I ever installed
I love love this app mini diary with lock app but I will this apps too good and many locks and used to easy and I am for using cooking and good diary I love my Secret Diary app thank you

title: My Dark Diary
descriptionHTML:
Your personal life journal with vampire/dark theme: notepad, tasks organizer/manager and diary, protected with a password.

*** Features ***
- the application's UI is in English;
- set a password, lock the journal;
- create to do list;
- organize all your tasks, sort by priority, set color for a task;
- weekly tasks view;
- simple notepad - keep all your notes/memos;
- simple diary with emoticons and weather icons;
- with advertisements;
- not adapted for tablets;

*** Password ***
- to see the options for changing it press the menu button (or menu on the navigation bar) on your phone on the first screen;
- it can be set and change from the first screen - menu "Change password";
- if you forget it, you can see it from the first screen menu - "Forgotten password";
- the Skip button is only to look at the diary and decide if you will use it. After setting a password the Skip button will disappear;

If you have any questions, please e-mail me: diarytheapp@gmail.com
summary: 🚀 Trusted by over 500 000 users! Secret Dark Diary with password,images,tags
recentChanges:
- NEW - Ads can be removed
- Diary entry content can be hidden from the list of entries - go to Settings and uncheck "Show diary entry excerpt in entries list"
- Show diary entry time in entries list
comments: Okay, so I completely adore the aesthetic of this app the ONLY problem is that EVRY time I begin to really write and get into it I pause to check something else and if I clear the tab it erases ALL my work and doesn't auto save. I wish this app would auto save your work so if you close the app you can continue later. I lost so much work 😓 cuz I'm a dummie and closed the tab...

Its good. I like it alot. Love this for keeping my tasks and diaries. Um, one thing id like to see is a widget that sits on my screen. A floating widget were i can press a button to see my memos, a button to hit for making diaries, and another for tasks and entries. Please add an awesome widget to expand this awesome app. Then ill re rate 5 stars

I really like this App, I'm not just saying this just to say it. I've have used a few other notepads and journal apps but they all seemed to have something missing... and then I found this Gem! Or maybe it found me so-to-speak... Ive always been attracted to the Darker Side of things, and it always intrigues me to dive a little deeper... And now i have one more item to add to the collection, it has a great look and easy to use and navigate thru and the dark Theme makes it even SEXIER!!

I saw a lot of BUG, 1. bug when updating a photo in note, photo didn't update and make app stuck for some times 2. For now just that, over all its good, the bad i found for now just what im write. Thanks for your service and respond. Alex

No unnecessary decorations. Simple. Neat. Classy. User friendly. Been a user since a long time now. Fully satisfied. Here is a little recommendation. Try including voice recorder also. It would be a innovative idea to be able to keep some secrets directly as voices.

title: Plop - poop tracker & analyzer
description:
＊Easy to record color, shape and/or symptoms
＊Instantly analyze your data 
＊Insightful stats and trends to navigate your health

TRACK DAILY PROGRESS
You track your steps and heart rate; you track your calories and weight; you track your cycle and mood; why not track your droppings? You can learn a lot about your body's health by observing your stool.

DELIVER PERSONALIZED SUGGESTION
Doctors regularly ask for stool and urine samples as part of the diagnostic process. Your stool can reveal signs of infection, digestive issues or more serious health problems. Pay attention to what is going on with your body.

GENERATE TRENDS OVER TIME
Your waste is what can tell you the most about your health. Keep a log of your logs for your health; it's a dirty job, but someone's gotta do it!

Your intestines contain a rich ecosystem of germs, bacteria, and cells that promote a healthy immunity system. Taking care of your intestinal health is taking care of your overall health! Track your intestinal health with the Plop app, and get a health heads up thanks to your bottom.

Disclaimer:
Plop is not intended to self-diagnose, self-treat, self-alleviate or to exclusively compensate for any disease or disability. If you have any concern, please consult with your doctor, or other qualified healthcare professional before using this App. However, you are welcome to use this app, for self-tracking, or as a reference to support your visit to a doctor or other qualified healthcare professional. Use this App at your own risk. The creators don't take any responsibility for direct or indirect damage that could result from its use.

title: SafeDiary - your personal diary
description:
SafeDiary is a personal companion that will keep your thoughts, secrets and memories safe. Fix the most memorable moments in your life so you can return to them in the future.

★ Simplicity and functionality 🔥
The application has everything you need to comfortably keep your diary: formatting text, adding pictures, tags, mood tracker, search through records, etc.

★ Cloud synchronization  🔄
You can keep a diary from multiple devices at the same time, and your data will be securely stored in Google Drive.

★ Data protection 🔏
Now no one will know your secrets thanks to secure data protection with a password or fingerprint.

★ Search 🔎
Searching for your entries is now very easy: instant text search saves you time, and using tags allows you to search for similar entries.

★ Voice notes 🎤
You can attach voice messages to your entry if you do not have time to type.

★ Design themes 🌈
Change the colors of the app to your liking! There is a dark theme for the evening.

★ Multimedia 📸
Add videos and photos to your entries.

title: Poocount - Toilet Journal
description:
Having an Inflammatory Bowel Disease myself I made Poocount to help us keep track of bowel movements. Hope it makes toilet logging easier for you too.

- Easy tracking of you bowel movement
- Blood, Diarrhea and your own parameters
- Track with help of the Boston Stool Scale
- Custom notes to keep a journal of your bowel movements
- Charts to analyze all your data
- A developer that created this app for his own colon disease

You can easily add new entries and see a chart of all your bowel movements over time. (All the data stays on your device so you keep control over them)
I hope the app will be useful for you.


Why a Poocount app?

First, why would anyone want to log his/her bowel movements?
An increasing number of people have Inflammatory Bowel Disease  (Crohn/Colitis ulcerosa) or IBS (irritable bowel syndrome). There are lots of indicators of the severity of the illness, one of them being the amount of time you spend on the toilet and the type of poop you have.
It is really difficult to keep this information in your head. That's when I decided to develop a small app that can help me with this problem and hopefully you too. 

There are parameters like blood, or Diarrhea/diarrhoea that you can track. Poocount allows you also to add custom parameters like Pain/Urgency or any other symptome that might be important to you.


Credits

This app uses some of the poo smilies from the Poo Smiley Set of Rikki Lorie found under https://thenounproject.com/Gilleas/collection/poo-smiley-set/?i=385491

This graphics are licenced under the Creative Commons 3.0 https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/us/

comments: Having IBS and tried other tracking apps this one is the best. It is good as it can track custom metrics, such as urgency, pain, etc and most importantly it remembers the last selection so very quick and easy to add a new entry. Highly recommended

Not worth the $1.99. If you put in an entry the minute you're going to the bathroom, the time will be exact but will only do increments of 15min otherwise. The scroll UI to change time is horribly sensitive. Poops and notes are separate entries, not together. Text box in note entries doesn't support autocorrect, navigating anywhere in the text, or copy&paste; SUPER annoying for spelling errors. Blood tracking appears in entries even when turned off. Cute app icon, but overall underdeveloped app.

title: Flow Journal: Write a Diary
description:
Keep a journal and reflect. Writing is fundamentally system of organizing thoughts, and keeping a journal helps organize the mind. Taking time to write your thoughts will help you make sense of the world, your feelings and your motivations. How does it really work? Quite simply by freeing our mind from the job of processing that experience. As a result, it has been shown to improve our mood and leave us to sleep better.

There's no single magic moment. Building a habit to reflect every day through a journal entry, even if it is brief, yields many benefits over time. Similar to meditation, scientific studies have showed that it can boost mindfulness, communication skills, and working memory. It also helps heal wounds faster, by labeling them and acknowledging them, and ultimately making sense of difficult experiences. Think of it as "brain drain", a way to expel your energy buildup that muddies our subconscious.

Features:
- Daily reminders to reflect.
- Organize your day with themes.
- Track themes and notice patterns over time.
- Discover which themes are correlated, and which are not.
- Ads free.
- Complete privacy. Your data is in the safest possible place - in your hands.

If you choose to purchase the Premium Subscription, payment will be charged to your account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your "Account Settings" in the Play Store after purchase. Current Full Access subscription price starts at $4.99/month. Prices are in US Dollars, may vary in countries other than the U.S. and are subject to change without notice. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. If you don’t choose to purchase the subscription, you can simply continue accessing the free features.

Privacy Policy: https://www.uncaught.app/privacy

Terms: https://www.uncaught.app/tos

For additional support, contact us at support@uncaught.app
