title: Bowel Stomach Pain & IBS Diet stomach indigestion
description:
Bowel Stomach Pain & IBS Diet Tips is a Free App for android mobile devices that provides all diet tips and help information about Irritable bowel syndrome. IBS is also called spastic colon and it is An intestinal disorder causing pain in the stomach wind diarrhoea and constipation etc problems.

IBS or Irritable bowel syndrome is a functional gastrointestinal disorder that affects the large intestine called colon. It is related to increased sensitivity of the gut and problems digesting food. Irritable bowel syndrome commonly causes cramping abdominal pain bloating gas diarrhea and constipation. Cramps and abdominal pain make everyday activities unbearable. 

People with IBS have symptoms that can include:

* Diarrhea (violent episodes of diarrhea)
* Constipation 
* Constipation alternating with diarrhea
* unwanted weight loss
* insomnia
* Belly pains or cramps, usually in the lower half of the belly, that get worse after meals and feel better after a bowel movement
* A lot of gas or bloating
* noisy stomach
* Harder or looser stools than normal
* Some people also have urinary and sexual problems

The condition can be painful and debilitating, which can have a negative impact on your quality of life and emotional state but With appropriate medical and psychological treatment, you should be able to live a normal, full and active life with IBS.

People suffering from IBS disease usually suffer with stress and anxiety but Change in daily diet and lifestyle may help cope with the situation. 
Certain foods can help IBS, but everyone is different. Examine your symptoms and talk to your doctor before starting a new diet.

title: Perfect Journal - Diary Towards Goals
description:
Perfect Journal provide a  private space for you to feel, think, remember, discover and dream. It not only helps you keep track of every chunk of your life in a convenient and secure way, also allows you to write, monitor and review your goals of life in an effective way.

Top Reasons You Need Perfect Journal:
-   Want to reach your goals by keeping a journal
-   Want to record every moment of your life privately 
-   Want to have a healthier mind
-   Want to keep affirmation and gratitude list
-   Want to define and manage tasks or todo list

Key Features of Perfect Journal – Diary Towards Goals
-   Organize journal entries with beautiful layouts 
-   Plan your goals of life – journal your moments or towards goals 
-   Advanced editor with powerful text formatting, image in lines
-   Mood tracker, activity tracker, weather information and location tagging
-   Task management with Todo list 
-   Attach photos & videos to your journal 
-   Make unlimited photos & videos as an album
-   Export & import photos
-   Hand drawing 
-   Calendar view, highlights of your writings in months
-   Atlas map 
-   PDF and text export – single entry & multiple entries
-   Print

-   Share journal entry to social media
-   Reminders 
-   In-app and system notifications

-   Statistics and beautiful charts of your writing patterns
-   Reports towards goals 
-   20+ different colors as a background theme
-   Night theme or Dark mode supported 
-   Affirmations – your quotes to inspire you
-   PIN lock 
-   Back up on Google Drive or to external files
-   Restore from previous backups 
-   Automatic backup

Journal Towards Goals
What goals do you want to achieve in your lifetime?

Perfect Journal allows you to define goals and record your progress. You can even think of it as a self-coaching tool, helping you manage every aspect of your life, from a good health to a financially independent life.
-   Define, monitor, track & write about your goals 
-   Review achievements monthly 

Secure and Private
Your data are stored locally on your device. All calculations are also performed on your device. Your backups are stored on your device or on Google Drive. It is in cloud private space with your Google account and no one can access to your backup files.

Perfect Journal can be a powerful tool to help you on achieving your goals. Live your best life by setting goals, and journal it with our app which will help you to achieve those goals.

P/S: 
Languages supported are English, Vietnamese, German, Italian, French, and more will be added soon.
descriptionHTML:
Perfect Journal provide a private space for you to feel, think, remember, discover and dream. It not only helps you keep track of every chunk of your life in a convenient and secure way, also allows you to write, monitor and review your goals of life in an effective way.

Top Reasons You Need Perfect Journal:
- Want to reach your goals by keeping a journal
- Want to record every moment of your life privately
- Want to have a healthier mind
- Want to keep affirmation and gratitude list
- Want to define and manage tasks or todo list

Key Features of Perfect Journal – Diary Towards Goals
- Organize journal entries with beautiful layouts
- Plan your goals of life – journal your moments or towards goals
- Advanced editor with powerful text formatting, image in lines
- Mood tracker, activity tracker, weather information and location tagging
- Task management with Todo list
- Attach photos & videos to your journal
- Make unlimited photos & videos as an album
- Export & import photos
- Hand drawing
- Calendar view, highlights of your writings in months
- Atlas map
- PDF and text export – single entry & multiple entries
- Print
- Read aloud
- Share journal entry to social media
- Reminders
- In-app and system notifications
- Advanced search & tag functionality
- Statistics and beautiful charts of your writing patterns
- Reports towards goals
- 20+ different colors as a background theme
- Night theme or Dark mode supported
- Affirmations – your quotes to inspire you
- PIN lock
- Back up on Google Drive or to external files
- Restore from previous backups
- Automatic backup

developerAddress: Tan Huong street , Tan Quy ward, Tan Phu district, Ho Chi Minh city, Vietnam

Perfect Journal - Diary Towards Goals v1.0.9

comments: A best journal app, a wonderful task manager and a planner towards your goals in life. Three of these targets in just single app, with beautiful and clean user interface, lots of customization and features like rich text editor, attach photos, moods, weather and activities... Love that perfect journal.

Well made journaling app. What a great, clean UI for journaling your everyday thoughts, while accomplishing your set goals. There are a few misspellings here and there, and I'd like a way to add new moods, activities, but with time this app will get better, I'm sure. 5/5

That is a very well designed journaling app. Clean, beautiful UI for journaling your everyday moments, while defining goals to achieve. Also, privacy and high secure.... That would be great if the app also has to-do-list features...
Perfect Journal is a great app to Express yourself. During the pandemic I've managed to write down my thoughts and the plans that I have after. It allows you to have your privacy and Express yourself
Love this app and use it during travelling time, keeping thoughts and beautiful pictures of any where visited... Also, it's perfect for planning my travelling targets and activities...

title: Diary Book
description:
This diary Book App let you write your own personal notes of daily events, appointments, secrets and feelings securely. 

FEATURES:
• Password protection
• Fingerprint Access
• Picture upload
• Emojis via Quick access keyboard (requires Android 4.1 or higher)
• Easy to use
• Multiple Pictures uploads
• Theme Change
• The most desirable diary app on Google Play!


Feel Free to contact me for new features or bugs using the contact us button in the login Page 

Build from the ground up to be simple and user friendly, the user interface is designed to allow you to enter new notes quickly and easily. With this Diary you can write all your private notes and secure them with a pin code.


Track and write about your daily activities
Make it a habit to quickly write one or more diary throw the day. Simply leave a few words about your workout session, what happened at school or in the office during your day. In weekends, you can write about all the fun you had walking your dog, meeting with friends, or being social with your family. This can be the daily activity log you always have wanted. 

Fingerprint Access 
very secure and let you access your Diary with ease

Picture Upload
Needed for every diary to let you slide in the memory lane :)

Emojis
If your Android phone support it, you can use emojis in all entries. Decorate diary notes with beautiful heart and love emojis, or popular sport or emotional face smileys. If the phone does not yet have native support for this, we recommend you try downloading a third party emoji keyboard from Google Play.

Have fun and let this App be your best friend.
Enjoy your life and create amazing stories with this App!

Very nice application. Useful to record all your diaries. Highly recommend.
I like the theme change feature and the finger print access that is not present in any other app
Very nice up you can use it as note taking app by date , like it very much i suggest everybody to try it

title: Stars Diary – Journal, Mood, Note, Photo, Pin Lock
description:
Stars Diary is designed to aid in capturing all of life's moments. With two steps, you can track your mood with emoji and write journal attached with unlimited photo. All diaries become shining stars on the sky. Don't you want to remember the richness of life, all the good and bad? 

Features:
⭐ Star In the Sky. When you write a diary or journal, the number of stars increases
⭐ Reminisce a Lot. Tap star to pop diaries and reminisce your days.
⭐ Beautiful Design. Enjoy your diaries with beauty.
⭐ Unlimited Photos. Keep your photo in your diary or journal.
⭐ Photos Gallery. A photo album of recorded photo.

⭐ Track Your Emotion. Customize the moods with different color and beautiful emoji.
⭐ Analyze Your Emotion. Explore interesting statistics about your moods such as your mood score and distribution of moods
⭐ Visualize Your Emotion. See your moods in 'Year in Pixels'
⭐ Flexible Range. Mood scale from 1 to 10
 
⭐ Warm Reminders. Set reminders and never forget to create a memory
⭐ Powerful Search. Advanced search for journal: date range, mood, keywords and more
⭐ Secure Pin Lock. Turn on PIN lock and keep your entries safe
⭐ Cloud Backup. Safely back up and restore your entries via your private Google Drive
⭐ Local Backup. Keep your own copy of your data.
⭐ Convert To PDF. Read your diaries with PDF.

⭐ Amazing Themes. Various beautiful theme backgrounds (Keep updating)
⭐ Calm your Heart with Music. Various touching music (Keep updating)
⭐ Customizable Font. Support for various font families
⭐ Amazing Colors. Various theme color
⭐ Dark Mode. Switch between day and night.

⭐ Supported languages: English, Chinese, Indonesian

We treasure your privacy. Stars Diary does not collect or store any of your personal data. They are fully under your control.

Developed with Flutter and Firebase.

recentChanges: Impressive new version
comments: I found this app during a very difficult time, it's now part of my daily routine. I haven't missed a day in almost 4 months. I love everything about it, especially the customization, and newest update. I recommend it to everyone! ♥️
It was good at Start but when it was updated all my write ups vanished and when I'm trying to sign in it's not working.💔so the experience was bad

I'm really loving this app. Exactly what I wanted / needed. Also, it is truly FREE! No subscription needed for all the features. My only complaint so far is that typing on the app. is wonky. Auto caps & punctuation doesn't work. But! If that's not something you worry about, it's a minor inconvenience. Great app.!

I have literally been using this app for a year now, it was the best app ever until just now when I got into the app, EVERYTHING WAS GONE, ALL of my entries! I Had a lot of good memories in there and now they are gone! The stars are still there, but every thing that I wrote is gone! If this happens often, please fix it! I really love(D) this app 😞

Good little diary app until it glitches and deletes your data. Never got a chance to back it up so I know it's mostly my fault. Just disappointed that this glitch even exists and it seems like devs don't care to fix it or express any apologies to users who lost entries. Any feedback that isn't positive, they ignore. Deleting this app and will never use anything from this company again. Users beware! I also wonder if backup would of even been saved and not deleted anyway.

title: Notepad
description: Easy & simple notepad that you can use for quick note taking, for writing a diary or as a private notebook.
descriptionHTML: Easy & simple notepad that you can use for quick note taking, for writing a diary or as a private notebook.
summary: Notepad is a simple text editor for your android devices
comments: Too many ads. It could be a great one without the distractions.

it got glitchy when i tried copy and pasting. had a sort of lag to it. it made it annoying when scrolling through each paragraph. other than that, i say its a good app. few adds but theor at the top and out of the way. theirs a lock to confirm if you want to delete items too which is one of features i was looking for. only problem was the glitchy lag.

Perfect app for storing information. Notepad is the most used but least recognised utility. People get attracted by additional facilities which they hardly use. And ultimately use all like notepads only. Then why not stick to notepad from the beginning. Great app. Thanks.
The note pad details cannot transfer to new phone. That is a big drawback
Don't use this! It slows down whenever you type a whole paragraph on it! its no good to write longer notes into it. It'll slow down on you if you do!

title: Journal, Diary, Notes, Mood Tracker: Snaps Journal
description:
Private space for your thoughts, feelings, moments, whether it is a party or work just save every incident forever.

Snaps is easy to use a free digital journal or diary for you to store your memories, thoughts, events, experiences, photos and other personal things that interest you. An extension of your mind from outside judgment: safe and free. It is a must-have personal diary app in your phones and devices to help you organize your thoughts, daily routine, Mood tracking and Travel logs. 

Snaps provide a powerful search to find your journal or diary entries by any keyword, tag, date or location. All your journal entries, memories, thoughts are preserved securely & Snaps help you track all your memories in the easiest & simplest way possible. 

Features:
- Organize diary or journal entries using tags
- Personalize your snap entries with different colors, themes, fonts and size
- Sync your notes entries to all your devices 
- Attach photos to your journal. Make unlimited photos Journal entry and use it as a photo album
- Support for the audio diary: Now make your diary your companion using the audio diary entry
- You can also start Video Journaling as we all know Video speaks louder than words :P
- Feeling stressed? Don't worry, we got you covered! Now start listening to calming and soothing meditation sounds and guided meditation  
- Get your daily dose of motivation from our beautiful collection of Daily Quotes 
- Powerful search & tag functionality
- Mood tracker, activity tracker, location tagging and weather information to make every entry rich and powerful
- Advance printing and sharing options to share your entries in PDF, zip and text/media formats
- Google Fit integration with analysis of your Calorie and steps data
- Support for Night theme or Dark mode so that you can have a pleasant experience writing and expressing your moments
- Support for statistics and beautiful graph of your writing patterns and share them with friends and family and compare with them
- Get throwback for your entries and relive those memories
- Protect your daily Journal with fingerprint lock and password lock from day one. So no more prying eyes
- Guided Meditation, Sleeping stories

You can also use Snaps app as Diet Journal, Photo Journal, Fitness Journal, Secret Diary, travel diary, notebook, Gratitude journal, video diary, food diary, mood tracking or photo album.

comments: To be honest in the past, I really love this app, But this days I can't say that anymore because this app autosave setting is very very bad. Example when you try to edit a bunch of paragraphs and when you scroll downward it is very very slow plus when you accidentally hit the select in the reason you don't know , then accidentally hit a letter, the whole bunch of your precious words are gone like that. And you can't even hit "don't save" because it doesn't have one.
This app produces good habit of journaling daily. And I'm loving it. The mood tracker n quotes are really good features

I love this app!! ❤️😍❤️ I do wish that I could access a lot of the features that cost money. I know that the monthly subscription isn't much BUT with everything going on currently, due to these "COOTIES-19", I might be able to subscribe. But during this time I NEED every single penny that I have/get. But again, I love this app, and I recommend it to anyone who is looking for a good journaling app!! 💯

This will be the first time i will rate something. The app is really recommended. I download a lot of journal but this is the one left after i uninstalled it all. I hope this app will be forever be free. I can't find the commentator on one of lavendaire's YouTube vids. But thanks for commenting this 💗 god bless
Cool app! Regularly reminds you to write. Lock is super fast to kick in. Layout is perfect. Love it!!

title: Card Diary – Daily Journal, Mood Tracker & Memoir
description:
Make everyday meaningful. Card Diary - Daily Journal, Mood Tracker & Memoir lets you create concise daily entries to catalog emotions, moods, and thoughts.

A perfect place for you to think, feel, discover, remember, and dream.

Take a break - turn your attention inwards and listen to what’s going on in your mind.

How this self reflection app Works
> Register your feelings, thoughts or other musings on a single card every day
> Record memories and express yourself with text, symbols, locations or images
> Create a timeline of up to 365 cards for each year - reflect on your past, see how you’ve changed

The more you create cards, the larger your personal diary gets! Capture your daily moments and affirmations, make each day count.

Offer yourself the attention and time you deserve by expressing your thoughts and emotions in this amazing virtual journaling app. Bid farewell to the old ways of recording daily ongoing as you can use this modern app to record your thoughts, record memories, express your emotions and save your daily lessons to view them later. Whether you like to keep a track of your progress or simply need a journaling companion, this anti depression app is here to help you. Try it now!  

Record your thoughts!
Adopt a new habit of journaling or nurture your old passion for logging your days with this awesome journaling app. The app offers you the security, privacy, and freedom of expressing yourself in the most original and non-judgmental way. Simply pick a day and add a card to jot down your thoughts and save them to view later.

Interactive expression styles
The new mood and habit tracker app is not limited to text only. You can upload images or choose pre-saved images to set as the background for the diary of every month or day. You can use the emoticon to express your thoughts and emotions symbolically. Add tags to label the diary or add any location in the private journal. You can also record daily weather or favorite that card of the journal for later use.

Features of Card Diary – Daily Journal, Mood Tracker & Memoir
•	Simple and easy journal app UI/UX
•	Hassle-free diary app layout and appealing design
•	Clutter-free options and smooth controls
•	Choose from over 20 different colors as a background for each month
•	Upload image for the diary background of each month
•	Edit private diary and log in your emotions, weather, thoughts, and images
•	Add labels and location or tag your daily log
•	Use the search bar to search your diary logs
•	Diary lock available via passcode or facial recognition
•	Switch between dark theme and light theme
•	Multilanguage support available for the self reflection app
•	Try out cool and exciting fonts from the app
•	Auto save and diary syncing available so you never lose your logs
•	Import or export diary in text or PDF format
•	Share private diary to your social media handles 
•	Change font color, bold font, underline or italicized font

-------------------

About Us
We are a South Korean designer and two developers (both living in New Zealand) who have joined together to form a team called Rhythmical Studio. We love working together to bring you our ideas and apps.
As we’re a small team, we’d really appreciate your help with translations. Click ‘Help us to translate’ in Card Diary to help us. ^ ^
-------------------
Send us an email if you have any problems: hello@carddiary.me

We treasure your privacy. Card Diary does not collect or store any of your personal data. They are fully under your control.

Are you ready to record your thoughts and track your progress in one of the coolest online logs available? Use this online journal app to keep your daily track. Download and use Card Diary – Daily Journal, mood tracker & memoir today!

comments: Very simple journal app... Not worth paying for, sorry. 1. There are too many free, better, more aesthetically pleasing, and with more features. 2. There aren't even any features that make this app survival or over the top that are worth paying for...

Gorgeous APP 🤗, I think it has a well-selected set of features (sign of a thoughtful designer), and it meets my needs... it undeniably has an intuitive layout that triggers motivation. Love the concept! The secret is keeping it as simple as possible... I would give this a double 5 ⭐ if I could! Bought it and truly, no regrets 👍🤗😀

One of those apps that exactly fits what you are looking for. It has the amazing user experience, simple to create memories and easy to navigate dates or memories, easy search overall I loved it. Cost of pro is exorbitant, but I am sure they deserve what they claim. I wish at least sync was free, as storage is from google drive.
Location auto capture and manual location search/add is not working as well. Otherwise good.
Great to log tarot readings

title: Your Diary : Professional Diary, Secure Notes
description:
Your Diary - This diary is a private digital diary designed to influential brands and digital experiences.

Features on the Your Diary app include:

* 🔒 Password protection.

* ☁️Diary Data synced with server for free (No other diary give this for free).

* 📝 Advanced, Rich and Powerful Text Editor (No other diary give this for free).

* 🎨Themes and font styles.

* ❌ NO Disturbing Ads: This Digital Diary don't show disturbing ads.

* 🏷️ Custom Tags for daily pages.

* 📈 Graphs and progress view by tags.

* 👋 Add friends and share diary pages with them.

* 🖨️ Export pages in PDF for free.

* 🛡️ Data is always encrypted to ensure privacy (Not even a developer can read your data).

Your Diary is for serving the purpose of Professional Diary and Secure Notes.

Professional Diary: Your Diary can be used for professional diary purpose because it consists of a very rich and powerful text editor. User can also add work categories and mark them in the document using editor. With this categories feature user can track progress of his work and generate his work report anytime.

Secure Notes: Every note in Your Diary is encrypted with a social id hash key which is not stored with developers. Document is only decrypted at user's phone after login. So even developer cannot read your documents. You can securely store passwords or any personal information in Your Diary.

Secure Notes: Every note in Your Diary is encrypted with a social id hash key which is not stored with developers. Document is only decrypted at user's phone after login. So even developer cannot read your documents. You can securely store passwords or any personal information in Your Diary.
summary: A private, secure digital diary to maintain Journal, Memories, Tags & Note Book

title: Simple Diet Diary
description:
An easy to use diet logger. Can help you to lose weight, gain weight, or track any other target.


• Quick logging of your stuff.
• Log as many or as few nutrients as you like, and even invent your own.
• Look up nutrient values in the optional offline database, or enter them manually.
• Quickly select previously entered foods.
• Display each day's total or remaining nutrient allowance.
• View graphs of nutrient history.
• Share data as HTML, CSV or SQLite database.
• Home-screen widgets for quick viewing of your totals.


The in-app purchase unlocks the following features:


• Customize the widget appearance.
• Share daily totals and item data.
• Alter the date range when sharing data.
• Select the dark theme.
• Dynamically adjust targets.
• Choose actions for double-tap and long-press on the totals bar.


Permissions:


• The "Photos / Media / Files" permission is used for reading and writing backup files on the SD card.
• The In-app purchases permission is used for a single purchase to unlock the premium features listed above.

recentChanges: Using Android runtime permissions — The app will ask for Storage permission when needed, instead of when installed.
comments: Just started using it but first impressions are very good! Simple and intuitive UI, yet flexible functionality to let you do your own tracking the way you want to. No account, no ads, no data mining, no annoying pop-ups or unnecessary social network tie ins (I know ppl love those but I hate them). This is how most software should be made imho! I am very likely going to buy the premium version to support the devs efforts, even though it looks like the basic version covers everything I need/want.
I initially liked this so much. And then I go to use it again and every scrap of data I ever entered is totally gone. Such a disappointment. There's no point if it randomly deletes all my info.
Perfect & simple to use. I can enter my foods properly calculated and use my own database.

Wow! This is perfect for me. I have my own combination of diets I use, and i have had to create a spreadsheet to manage my tracking system. Spreadsheets aren't that easy to manage on phone screens. But this app is completely customisable, even to creating one's own entries as user definable units. I've been tracking my food for years, and this app has just made it so much quicker and easier! To the creator, thanks so much, dude. Brilliant job, and I've just bought the full-featured version. 👍

I liked the old app so I really put off this one I don't like change. It's ad-free and fully featured. No need to make a profile, search for brands (or at all), and has options to include any macro and how you want to display them next to the name or not. it shows remaining or total. With a toggle. It's basically perfect and I plan to buy the premium version for the dark theme.

title: Dehydration Fluid Therapy
description:
Learn right now the diagnostic criteria and management of the  fluid therapy for dehydration in children with diarrhoea in an easy and simple way. Based on World Health Organization (WHO), 2005 “Diarrhoea Treatment Guidelines”, (full text in http://www.izincg.org/Media/Default/Publications/Files/USAID_DiarrENGL.pdf ), check-out the recomendations for diarrhoea with no dehydration, some or severe dehydration.

Our calculator provides doses of oral rehydration salts, zinc sulfate and volumes of fluid according to age and weight of the patient and degree of dehydration.

The application also provides knowledge on WHO’s protocol, so the professional can make the choices him or herself.
Recomended for health caretakers, pediatricians, residents, estudants and everebody who work with children’s health.

Download also our application “Newborn fluid therapy”, make easy to calculate maintenance fluid therapy on newborns.

Contact: contato@3reistec.com

Follow on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/3ReisTec

title: Life : Personal Diary, Journal, Note Book
description:
Write your life journey and keep those memories forever. You can also write journals, notes, to do lists and your daily plans in this diary app. It is also a note keeper, you can keep your notes in this diary app. It is a pocket diary where you can express yourself. Write your secrets and feeling in this life diary. Keep your life memorable life moments and milestones in it.
This personal diary comes with password lock and it is also a diary with fingerprint lock. You can add your photo memories to the photo collection in this personal diary with lock. The pass code will protect your journal and notes forever. Life diary app will be your perfect companion to express yourself. This journal app work perfectly in offline, it is a offline diary.

We often write diaries in night time, that is why we provide free night theme in this diary app. By this you can completely relax and write your diary at night time.

Features

* Free Night Theme
* Password protection
* Photo Memories
* Voice to Text Input
* Diary Reminder
* Font Customization
* Landscape Support
* Secure and Safe
* Easy to Use

We know font customization are very important for a better experience that is why we providing complete set of font customization options like font size, font type etc with free night mode.
The app also support voice input, you can just use your voice to write articles. Because not all people like to use keyboards but you can use your sweet voice to create a diary note. Speech to text option makes it very easy to use. You can also customize diary with the collection of themes available including the special dark mode.
Landscape support is also available for the convenience. It is simple and easy to use.

So why are you waiting, download and start writing your good memories in diary.

comments: It really helps me when I have no one really to turn to because I can just vent into my diary. There is an optional choice to make it were you lock it so you only you have the password to get in. You can write in it more than once a day and continue writing. I totally suggest this app.

I would say its a pretty good app,its really nice,you can put passcode and stuff. I would really like it if i could put more pictures in the diary. But over all its really good but its not worth paying for the theme colors. Yeah its good and has good quality and you select the fonts and size which i really like.

I like the app, I wish it would lock anytime I close it. I'm able to open it back up after switching between apps, without having to use pin. Also, I would love a title on my entries as well as the date. Otherwise, nice journal.

Does exactly what a diary should do. And theres no problem at all when using it. And also its much neater than a normal book diary so having a diary now is much more peace of mind. I love this app. Highly recommended.

I really like the app, really hate the ads to be honest but hey ads revenue is a must these days so...if there was a one time payment which is reasonable for the pro version of this app then I would be down for that.

title: Diary - Notes, Goals,Monthly Planner & Reminder.

****Features***

# Personal Diary

# Notes
# To do list

# Food diary

# Password protection

Write every day for what you are grateful for, your ideas, and the most important task for the day.

comments: Great app. Ticks all my diary boxes. I also love that it doubles as my food and water tracker. If it were up to me to get anything added to the app it would be the ability to edit the time I eat my meals. Right now it logs the meal and assigns the time I made the entry as the time I ate. I usually add my meals at the end of the day so for tracking purposes it ends up looking like I ate all my meals at seven in the evening.

Great App. I do like the selection of options in the app (notes, goals, monthly planner, etc). It's definitely more suiting for female users. So far, it's the best app of its kind I've found, that meets most of my needs. The only thing I would change is adding more options (fonts, colors, etc). I'll continue to use this app until something better comes along. Thanks for creating such a convenient app!

This is a beautiful gem❤, everything I need in one place. Love that I'm able to change themes this keeps it fresh for me. Would love to see a check off for goals or task And a habit tracker would be a lovely addition. For expenses, to be able to name the accounts and add and deduct from each account would be nice. Maybe add tags and location for entries. But other than that, loving adding pics and the many awesome packed features. This is the best diary, planner ,tracker👏❤❤

Decided to download this app to try and be more positive, I quite like it and have been using it everyday... my reason for the 4 stars is because I feel like there should be more feelings to pick from and the "my money" section doesn't work properly... for example it only types £15 you can't put £15.50 because you can't use the full stop which means its not an accurate balance. Overall good app would recommend 😊

The app is quite handy and easy to find, since I don't have to go through a pile of books to locate it. I like the quotes sent in daily. My reason for the four stars is: I'm yet to maximize it's use though, and I just updated the app so I will need to use it for sometime to know if there are things to work on.

title: Notebooks
description:
***Now backup/restore to Google Drive or Dropbox***

Take notes and even attach your free hand drawing, everything in style and completely without papers!
Create multiple notebooks for every subject and avoid messing up your notes.

Notebooks is the only application you will ever need for all your note making needs. 
Designed with flexibility and ease of use in mind, taking notes is now at it simplest with our application. With multiple colors and custom title for each notebook cover, you will enjoy creating a notebook for every subject you want.

Notebooks is a must have application for students, business men and for anyone using their phones and tablets for taking notes.

*The permission GET_ACCOUNTS is to communicate with the Google Drive to backup the data. We do not store your account details in the app.

Features:
1. Create multiple notebooks.
2. Customizable cover, title, number of pages and page style for every notebook.
3. Password protected.
4. Set a title for every page.
5. Instant search within each notebook. 
6. Attach image files.
7. Bookmark a page.
8. Create your own free hand drawing.
9. Easily find your entries.
10. Custom fonts for each notebooks.
11. Set theme for each notebook.
12. Convert the entire Notebook to PDF with attachments. (Currently supports English only)
13. Apply text styles such as Bold, Italics and Colored-Highlights
14. Backup/Restore. 
    (***Option available in the menu of the Notebooks screen. Some devices will not have the hardware menu 
     button on the device, in that case 'long press' the 'All Apps' button to get the menu on the app***)

15. Backup to Google Drive (Works on devices with OS higher than version 2.2)
 
FAQs: http://www.droidveda.com/faq/faq_notebooks.html


How to use?
1. Use '+' mark in the home screen to create new books.
2. Long tap on any book to edit/delete the book.
3. Use 'Password' option to set/reset the password.
4. On the Page tap on Page Header to set the Title for the page.
5. Make use of different editing options provided at the bottom of the page.

Note : Kindly download the verified app only from Google Play. Do not download the app from any other app sharing sites.

comments: This the greatest academic app I've ever had. You can even listen to an AI reading your notes. However, may I suggest that the Italicize, Boldface, Underline, and Highlight be used to typewritten words. For example, I want to highlight a sentence. Instead of retyping it, can you make it possible not to retype and just highlight the chosen text. Thank you 😊

Actually i like this app , but the problem is that there are a lot of ads, I am ultimately irritated by this, where ever u type, you could not see where or what ur typing, just an AD in a rectangular shape, and there is no cancel option, u cannot remove the ad, it is so irritating, I downloaded this app so that I can write something but I think this app is for irritating everyone by ads.... And another concern is that u cannot add pics... Do not download I motivate other apps

This is really great. I like how it is organized, the beautiful fonts, I like everything about it; but may I suggest something please? I was thinking maybe you can make more pretty covers for the notebooks, not only the plain colors and maybe change the theme/design into something really appealing and pleasant to the eye. The overall appearance and design of the app is really important and essential, you know. Thank you so much, creators! I hope you see this review! Keep on improving ♥️

I liked the idea a lot except that there are very annoying ads (having ads at all is annoying, but these particular ads are atrocious). There is no undo button, and it always saves immediately after you edit something (including when you accidentally delete an entire paragraph). And lastly, unless I'm somehow just not figuring this out, you cannot embed an image into your text. You can "add attachments," but it only puts them in a random order you can view by clicking a button at the top right.

Just started using it, but this this seems like a great app for writing notes for school and books and stuff. The only thing that confused me at first is the fact that the sketches and attached images don't go on the page itself. They go into a little paperclip button on the top right corner. The sketch feature could also benefit with zoom and undo/ redo features. I would highly recommend!

title: Cute Shiba Inu Anime Diary App
description:
🐶 Find out how to write a diary the right way! You've outgrown custom planners and sticky notes for girls long time ago. And knowing you got yourself a mini “shiba inu dog” as a new member of your huge family of kawaii pets, we've decided to combine two things you love the most and create a puppy emoji “diary writing” app. Just one of the things that makes our secret journal with lock and key special, is that you get to use manga dog stickers to express your emotions in the best possible way. 📕 Cute Shiba Inu Anime Diary App 📕 allows you to put your writing journal game to the next level. Don't be yet another kawaii girl with a true love “diary app with lock” on her phone. Make a note and show everyone how deep is your love for a chibi pet dog. Fill your personal diary for teenage girl with cute pictures of puppies and japanese dog shiba inu stickers. This lockable journal gives you the chance to hide your love messages and romantic letters from praying eyes. 🐶

🗝 Add a new memo notes every day
🗝 Let our personal assistant help you with one of the greatest writing apps for girls
🗝 Play our lottery and win cute kawaii chibi stickers
🗝 Take a selfie and add it to your photo diary that you can write in
🗝 Save sweet memories and never forget them with 📕 Cute Shiba Inu Anime Diary App 📕
🗝 Change your small shiba inu background images or add beautiful cards to improve your love story writing skills
🗝 Adapt and change size and font style to express your mood and feelings 
🗝 Add a unique pin code to protect your memories

🐶 You've seen virtual pet games and you know they can take a lot of your precious time. Thanks to this secret diary with password you'll enjoy the company of your “shiba inu cartoon” dog while keeping your mood journal. There is no reason why you should not give your kawaii shiba puppy the attention it deserves. After all, dogs are man's best friend, and they deserve nothing less than the “best diary app”! But taking care of your own well being isn't selfish. Piling up the anger and the sadness inside is simply foolish. So go nuts and say it all to our cute “diary with lock and key”! You won't know what is love until you see a smiley dog face on your kawaii pet. Write whatever you want in this 📕 Cute Shiba Inu Anime Diary App 📕! The relief you'll feel each time you use our clever “dog diary app” will give you the much needed strength to keep going on. 🐶

🐶 Make your own diary the way you've always wanted! You can add whatever you want to your love notes. Maybe some pug stickers or cute shiba inu puppies here and there? Yours is just to select a kawaii dog that has a special place in your heart and based on that, you shall get the richest collection of “girls diary” stickers. On good days you can cover the pages of your journal with funny dog pictures and on the tough ones, put a puppy eyes emoji to follow your sad diary entry. What else could we say to convince you that one of the best shiba dog apps is in front of you? It is obvious, but this kawaii diary planner comes with shiba anime stickers to give a unique glow to your secret password journal app. You won't have to be strict and write a daily diary note. Just enjoy your life and make a scrap book out of your best memories! 🐶

🐶 If you're creative but don't know how to express it, we might just have a thing for you.
 📕 Cute Shiba Inu Anime Diary App 📕 was made for someone like you. Say goodbye to sticky fingers trying to glue cute dog pictures all over your “lock diary for girls”.We've found the way to combine free shiba inu games and “personal diary with lock”. The result is in front of you and it will leave you speechless

What else could we say to convince you that one of the best shiba dog apps is in front of you? Just enjoy your life and make a scrap book out of your best memories! 🐶

🐶 If you're creative but don't know how to express it, we might just have a thing for you.
📕 Cute Shiba Inu Anime Diary App 📕 was made for someone like you. Say goodbye to sticky fingers trying to glue cute dog pictures all over your “lock diary for girls”.We've found the way to combine free shiba inu games and “personal diary with lock”. The result is in front of you and it will leave you speechless

title: Journey: Diary, Journal
description:
Join millions of Journey users and create a healthier, happier mind. A sanctuary for your mind and soul, Journey will help increase your positive energy, be more grateful and a calmer mind by building healthy thinkings through journaling. 

We’re more than just a journal, or a diary; we’re your own motivational coach and happiness trainer. Let's embark on a fabulous journey of self-improvement today. 

Top Reasons You Need Journey:

⁃ Want to find a place to keep daily reflections privately
⁃ Want to pour your feelings/brain dump
⁃ Want to keep a affirmation and gratitude list
⁃ Struggle to maintain a journaling routine
⁃ Want to get out of depression
⁃ Have anxiety and cannot calm the thoughts in your mind
⁃ Track the achievements you've made in life

Journey Benefits:

⁃ Focus and Concentration
⁃ Better Sleep
⁃ Managing Stress
⁃ Calming Anxieties and Meditation
⁃ Happiness
⁃ Healthier Mind
⁃ Better Habits
⁃ Motivation

Integrated Coaching:

Ready for a healthier mind? Take your life to a new level by using our integrated journaling prompts by Journey coach: 

⁃ Inspire Me
"One good quote is worth a book". Receive daily inspirational quotes by famous people. Think and write how the idea applies to your life.

⁃ Gratitude 365
"Whether you appreciated and give thanks for will increase in your life". Write 3 things you are grateful based on a topic of the day.

⁃ Love & relationship
Reflect on your romantic relationship and identify habits that you need to build, problems that you need to fix, and the issues that you need to prevent in your relationship.

And More...

Journey Features:

⁃ Sync to cloud via Google Drive
⁃ Passcode and fingerprint protected
⁃ Available on mobile, desktop and web
⁃ Integrate Journey coach: a daily/weekly journaling prompt
⁃ Beginners step-by-step guide to journaling
⁃ View entries in timeline, calendar, map
⁃ Advanced search: Activity, mood, favorites
⁃ Compose entries via email
⁃ Link to Zapier


To learn about Journey, please visit this page:
https://journey.cloud.

Permissions Required
⁃ ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION: Determine precise location to retrieve places and weather
⁃ READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Import diary entry
⁃ WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Export and share journal entry

recentChanges:
Thanks for using Journey! This update allows members to purchase "Lifetime Membership" to unlock the web, desktop & mobile apps forever.

Be sure to try out our new Coach programs (guided journal) this fall, including "Body Positivity" by coach Adrianne, "Finding Energetic Alignment" by coach Jenn, "Hello Autumn" & "Halloween Prompts".

Enjoy!
comments: H meave been using this diary for a long time. It's excellent! But I'm finding many of the photos I added appear as duplicates. Very annoying having to delete and add them again. Why is this happening? It seems random. Can anyone explain why this is happening. Duplicate photos only appearing on my phone, the computer version is always perfect.

I was more of a pen and paper type, which I still do on occasion but I love the fact I can ad photos and that will autoadjust the location of my entry to match the photo so I can show and speak to the moment. I can also journal on my driving commute which is always where I'm unloading the days thoughts and feel inspired. It's so easy and will always be able to be found.

I tried to export the journal to a new email account; exportation is only supported with a premium account. So I signed up for a 7-day trial with auto-renewal in order to export my journal... but was unable to import the journal into the new email account. Now frustrated, I tried to turn off the auto-renewal so I wouldn't be charged for a functionality that didn't work. No dice. The link provided in the help desk was 404-ed, the link provided in the desktop app didn't work. In short, fraudulent.

I love this app. So nice that I can add pics, audios, videos, links to my entries. It's so personal and meaningful. I wish it hadn't deleted some of my videos though. They were working and now it shows the entry is empty. Overall, best app I've found.

At first I loved the app and made entries daily. Then all of sudden a question pops up in my head, "what if the developers reads these daily enteries". I never felt right since. I purchased the membership but I dont feel I have 100% privacy.

title: Correlate - Health Diary and Life Journal
description:
Correlate is a smart life-journal app that helps you understand why are you feeling sick thanks to a scientific algorithm. It's very effective with flu symptoms, allergy symptoms and also gut health. 

How many times you said that you want to improve your health, or simply that you want to get rid of symptoms like:
- Flu symptoms: fever, nausea, vomiting, lassitude, bowel movements
- Allergy symptoms or skin issues: hay fever, pollen allergy, dust allergy, food intolerances
- Gut health: bowel movement, diarrhea, irritable bowel
- Mood disorders: stress, anxiety, depression, migraine, headache, bipolar disorder

The app has multiple usages:
💊  health book / therapy journal / medication log: record your symptoms and medications
🍎  habit tracker / food diary: keep a daily journal of your habits or food
👩‍⚕️  symptoms checker: like a medical journal, enter your sick days streaks and get a self diagnosis from correlations
🤧  specific uses: headache diary, flu tracker
🧘‍♂️  other: pain journal, mood tracker, allergy tracker, anxiety journal, event logger, sleep journal.

With Correlate you can now discover the origin of your illnesses, and improve health. It has been designed to help you manage pain, stress, and develop healthy habits: it's a perfect medical assistant always in your pocket. 

Are you striving for a symptoms analysis or a pain diagnosis? With this symptoms tracker you can easily analyze and track behaviors to discover symptoms related causes. The best symptoms checker among health apps and habits tracking apps.

When you can use it?
Many people are suffering from allergy symptoms, headaches, chronic pains, intolerances, mood disorders, stress symptoms, and they are feeling sick without a diagnosed cause. How often are you thinking: "I'm feeling sick and I need to discover my sickness origin?". With the help of a habit tracker (also a symptom tracker / activities tracker) you can track activities, symptoms, mood, habits, medicines, and understand how they are related to each other. You may find out that your chronic headaches causes is celiac disease, lactose intolerance, allergy to gluten, pollens, dust or other allergens, chrons disease, or that they are symptoms of stress (stress headaches). It's a food diary (diet journal), a symptom checker, a mood tracker, a food diary, a habit tracker, an activities tracker, a pain diary and a medicine logger all in one app.

Features:
- Calendar event tracker: Track habitual activities, record medical symptoms, log simple habits, check daily routines, track moods and keep a food journal all in one place. Different diaries allows you to record any event with a simple calendar.
- Statistics: analyze symptoms frequency, and perform triage on yourself: are you feeling sick very often? Did you forget a pill? Is your workout calendar on track? Are you developing good weekly or monthly habits? Are you eating health food often enough? Everything is under control.
- Correlation analysis: discover if you are allergic to anything, and how you can change habits to improve health, or improve pain management. Learn what makes you sick or give you issues and cut it from your diet / routine / habits.
- Export data: export your food log / pain journal / diet log / symptom diary, save it or share it.
- Develop healthy habits: when you track habits and you discover that they help you feel better, go for it! Improve your food management by reiterating healthy food habits, understand your headache symptoms and live a better life.

Warning: Correlate is just one of the many medical apps on the store. It does not substitute doctor visits, and it does not provide a professional diagnosis for your symptoms. However, Correlate can help you and your doctor to track your activities and better understand your symptoms.

recentChanges: Don't just keep track of your life. Improve your health!
comments: Would be great if the app gave the option to track the time along with the date of the symptom. The time of day is just as important as the date itself and a pretty standard question providers ask when asking patients about their symptoms. I have to keep a time and date log while wearing a heart monitor so they can correlate the two but I don't see how to do that. I will be requesting a refund.

The app is quite good but you need to add more functions and more details, add stuff that would keep your customers motivated to use it. E.g if you use the app and enter data you have an animal that grows as you enter data every day. Once that animal grows you get another animal or plant or a garden or something that you'd care for while caring for yourself.
Quite impressed but the calendar could do with improvement, need to be able to set a time for items and have a repeat options. But all in all it seems pretty good.
Weird unintuitive interface, doesn't allow you to select more than 1 item e.g. when I add activity it deselect mood and it won't generate a list of items you've selected. Doesn't make any sense.

after playing with the app a bit more I'm going to have to pause in my use. I love the simplistic way of checking off symptoms as I have them and the ability to find correlations. how ever this would be helpful for gathering the frequency of my symptoms. I'm currently using the flexable journal app if that app would correlate like yours with more flexability in what and how you can correlate and link it would be an amazing program

title: Diary with Lock Password & Scrapbook Notes Editor
description:
The Personal Diary is a Free android app with easy and useful features such as Password Lock Pattern Security and Notes Safety etc.

This personal virtual diary is useful in many ways for you. In this, we have included many features like Diary, Scrapbook and Drawing book. This App allows you to add data, save it forever, and read it anywhere anytime. You can put all your thoughts and can open and read it, and enjoy that past memory with your heart anytime. App also has Additional Scrapbook and Drawing Canvas Features to express emotions and creativity.

You can also save your work routine and set reminder for next day. The Personal Diary Note app gives you the choices of Creative Fonts, Text Styles and Cool Clip arts. Besides this you also have Daybook or Journal, Creative Diary and Notes Personalization options and Stationery Features.

Here are some Features:
* Diary, Scrapbook and Drawing book in one app.
* Edit/delete previous notes, drawing or scrapbook data
* A number of text styles, text background and fonts choices with variety of colors.
* option to Set / Change or Remove Pattern lock and Password security.
* Sharing of data over Whatsapp, Social media and email etc.
* Funny Cute and creative stickers choices.
* Add reminders to calendar
* Backup copy of data
* Easy to use and Compatible with devices

You draw Creative Clip arts and pictures on drawing book, add color it with your favourite colour and edit it. In scrapbook you can add pictures from old memories and happenings, edit and can user various other options like add emoji and change background wallpaper or change background color etc.

In your free times or While travelling open this app in your phone and enjoy precious moments of past. To maintain the Privacy and data safety, you can also use pattern lock and screen lock features so that only you can read your content. You can Displays entries in the range of date and can changed Wallpaper themes according to memories and moods.

title: Flexible Journal - Prompts, Custom Health Log
description:
Flexible Journal is a customizable journal that lets you easily write entries using prompts. You can make prompts for tracking your life, health, books, and more all in one multipurpose journal. Prompts help you focus and track exactly what you want. Just choose what questions you want to be asked, and then answer them to write an entry in just a minute

Write easily using customizable prompts
Prompts are custom templates made up of questions that help guide your writing. For example, you can create a template to correlate health with nutrition. Just make a template with questions like ‘What symptoms am I having today’ and ‘What did I eat today’, you can even add checkboxes like ‘Did I take my medicine today’. Then you can write daily entries easily by just answering these 3 questions. What’s unique about Flexible Journal is that it lets you choose the structure of your templates, this lets you create a custom journal that’s unique to you

Track your life, health, books and more
You can create an unlimited amount of forms for all of your favorite activities. You can track reviews of books and video games, keep a record of your health, write about gratitude, mindfulness, and self-reflection, and much more. Create and customize your own forms or choose from the forms that come with the app

Track your progress with stats
Advanced custom statistics make it easy to visualize and measure your growth and progress. Stats are as flexible as your templates are, you can get statistics for whatever you want. You can correlate health to happiness and mood, or track your habits or weight-loss progress. There’s no limit to what you can record. Motivate your growth and progress by seeing how you’re doing each week and track your health, mood, and much more

Add photos, maps, tags and more to entries
Make your journal look beautiful by adding photos and locations to your entries. Flexible Journal is location-aware so you can track your entries on the map wherever you go. Snap photos or choose them from your gallery for a lovely entry to remember

Filter and search for entries easily
Organize your journal with categories, filters, sorts, searches, and more. Flexible Journal makes it easy to keep your data organized how you want. You can also find entries easily using advanced filters and searches so you never forget a memory

Export entries to spreadsheets, PDFs and more
Share your entries how you want. Share them with your favorite apps and by email. You can export your entries to many different file formats such as text, spreadsheet, and PDF so you can save and view them however you want. Spreadsheets give you extra flexibility to analyze your data using graphs and charts. PDFs make it easy to share your entries and text makes it easy to post your entries on websites and blogs. You can also export and share your forms and lists you create. Similarly, you can import and use forms shared with you.

Use it as a database 
Your personal journal can be used as your own personalized customizable database. Use forms as database objects. Log all the data you need. Good for tracking data like collectibles and much more

Good for any hobby
• Collection
• Hiking
• Movie reviews
• Travel
• Personal diary

Great for learning
• Homework assignment log
• To-do tasks

Excellent for growth
• Gratitude journal
• Mood tracker
• Therapy log

Website: www.journal24x7.com
Facebook: www.facebook.com/Journal24x7/

recentChanges: • You can now use multi-select to export entries to PDF
comments: I really loved using this app. It replaced so many other apps for me and I have been using it almost every day. However, since the latest updates a few days ago, the app keeps crashing on startup and I am unable to use it at all. Please fix this as I would really like to continue using it. UPDATE: I believe the bug has now been fixed, thank you! Will update again if there are any more issues.

I really like this app! Most of all: the fact that the devs are open to suggestions and bug fixes. I've asked for a few features that could be useful to improve my (and possibly other's) UI/UX and they've promptly and gracefully added the changes to the new update. I find that invaluable when using an app that someone else developed. Thanks for that! I only use a subset of the features available on the app so I can't give a thorough review of everything available. So far, I've had an excellent experience with the features that I've used. The only issue for me (but I totally understand) is the fact the dark theme is only available on the premium/pro version. I find that invaluable in any app but I understand that they need to make their money from somewhere. I will probably be recommending this app to anyone needing to log any form of data in a structured format. It allows to avoid needless repetition and provides useful UI/UX components to speed up the process.

Thank you for the app. Lots of options! I'm looking into using this more as a log/tracker than primarily as a journal. Would raise the rating if these issues are resolved: 1) Is there a way to manually move individual Forms up and down the list after being created? Same with Fields inside the forms? Seems basic given the level of customization allowed. 2) Is there a way to hide the "Recent" forms? It's distracting. I prefer to manually move my most used form on the top of the list.

This is the app I've spent my entire life searching for! I've owned and downloaded countless journals, planners and trackers, but this is the only thing that helps me organize my scattered mind and life all in one place! I've had it less than a week, but I've already created dozens of personal forms and more entries than ever before in one neat little place. I voiced concerns/suggestions and recieved prompt and professional responses, making me happy to pay the creators for this incredible tool!
I liked the trackers or "prompts" I liked being able to make my own page, my own " form"

title: Daily Life - Diary, Journal, Mood Tracker
description:
Record your daily life!

Record your daily life here and have fun!


[FEATURES]

1. Attach multiple pictures 
2. Search by dates with calendar
3. Password & pin code protection (Support Fingerprint)
4. Support for various font formats (Cute cursive font)

comments: Great app with easy-to-use interface. The icon happens to display my birthdate so it kinda won me over a little. Tried using it and another app for a few days and am glad it's so simple yet customisable. I also like that I can attach photos/videos in the diary. It's really like a diary on-the-go. Eventually uninstalled the other app and stuck with this. However, fingerprint unlocking is a little slow to react. Would be good if it can detect and unlock faster.

I've been using this app for more than a year. It's the most treasured diary app I have. I'm on premium and its the best. Thank you for the export to pdf function, its ingenious! And also all the back up and restore options. I was told that to log into my Google account I had to reinstall the app. It was nerve wrecking thinking about the chances of losing my data but everything worked fine. :)

Purchased the one-off premium feature, I got 50% and another RM2 discount. So far, I like the features. You can change the fonts, add pictures and emoji as emotions of your daily day. You can even take a look at others story, but you can choose to mute this feature. I wanted to write to express my emotions and I find out that this apps is compatible with my style, it's simple but all you need is there. Gonna use this for a very long time so I hope it'll always be this great! Thanks!

This app is really great!! ❤️ I Love it so much since the day i downloaded it to be honest. Its features are really cool. We could attach pictures, videos, gifs and audios etc.. And it has a mood tracks of our days and we could write our thoughts sooo much and has a lot of space to write. It even has a calendar to mark or anniversaries and can be added to all years.!!!I really love this app. Its more effective than writing a journal. 5 Stars.

I haven't had this app for long but this is great. I love the fonts and colors we can use. I also love how you can put it on private or share it with other people. Its amazing and even though not much people see it,I love it because its a diary for me but on the phone. Daily Life, your app is VERY GOOD

title: Khata Book Udhar Bahi Khata, Credit Ledger Account
description:
Khata Book (Ledger Account Book) - Replace your traditional Udhar bahi khata by new digital ledger cash book. It is 100% Free, Safe and Secure for all types of businesses to maintain their customers' accounts. It is Tally for mobile. Shop owners can use the app to record credit (Jama) and debit (Udhaar) transactions for their trusted customers.

Number #1 app to replace your offline Udhar Bahi Khata and transform it into a digital ledger Cash Book with a lot of great features.

* 100% Free, Safe and Secure 
* Free SMS updates to your customers on every transaction
* Automatic and Secure Online Backup
* Create Personal Khata books to manage udhaar/len-den of your friends & family
* Send WhatsApp payment reminder to your customers
* Manage multiple shops within one app
* Download your Customers  PDF Report
* Use one khata book account on Multiple Phones
* Set payment reminder date for your customer 
*  Secure your account book using App Lock 


With this ledger Cash Book you can also:

- Add a customer to Khata Book
- Edit Customer Information 
- Add Transaction done by Customer
- Edit old transactions of your hisab kitab app
- Delete Transaction from your account book
- Call customer to remind about pending payments directly from Khata Book app
- Whatsapp customer to inform about pending payments, increase your udhar recovery
- Easy Backup & restore Khata Book data
- Simple and easy to use design to manage your Udhar khata
- Add Udhar Jama anytime, anywhere
- Your Hisab Kitab app in your pocket
- This digital Cash Book is completely free to use
- 100% accurate and reliable khata book is a great len den app
- Tally for mobile

Khata Book is proudly made in India ❤️❤️

Especially useful for shopkeepers and small and medium businesses doing sales on credit and len den.

Any category of shop can use:
- Mobile Recharge and Electronics Shops
- Kirana Shop, General Store, Grocery Store, Provision Store
- Bakery, Snacks and Juice Shops
- Jewellery shop, jauharee, gold seller
- Medical Store, Local Pharmacy
- Garments, tailor shop
- Paan Shops, chai shop, cigarette dukaan 
- Personal Credit Book Keeping

Polly the worst app....the consultants they are fake....liers.....I lost my data 3-4 months ago..and they didn't solve it till now.... everytime I chatted they said plz wait for 72hrs and guess what their 72hrs never ended.....they don't understand what is sensitive data and what is not.....they simply get paid they don't do anything so if u have any problems never trust khatabook

title: Notes - Notepad
description:
Notes - Notepad is an intuitive, lightweight Notepad application serves all your note taking needs.
It gives you a quick and simple notepad editing experience when you write notes, memo, email, message, shopping list and to do list. 
It makes to take a note easier than any other notepad and memo apps.

Features Include:

- Auto-saved.
- Simply search notes using text.
- Create notes from other apps, using 'share'.
- Reserve your notes with import/export function.
- Simple Navigation

comments: Great app. People who don't remember things or forget frequently should download this app. I use it to keep notes of everyday work things. Otherwise it will be difficult to remember many things mentally. But if you keep notes of it, it will become easy. You can keep countless notes in this app. You can give a title to each note and you can also type in the search bar to find a particular note. You can also change the background colour of each note and save it. I loved this app a lot.

Its an okay app, most like the Easy Notes app I had on my old phone. Although in the older version, when a task was done, you could click on it and it would put a line thru it and move it to the bottom of the list. At that time, you could choose to delete completed tasks. I miss that because now I have to go line by line and delete wash item, kind of a pain. Just my thoughts

O. Listen up I've been using this program from my notes for a number of years now. Today I've downloaded it into my newest phone. It's very easy quick and not complicated to operate; that's its best feature, in my opinion, I love it and wouldn't change. Give your note a title, space down begin to type or talk.... Then it's all done, hit save, go on about your business

Nice app. It maintains serial .We can take out notes serially and by name also.It has kept the unfailure rules. It gives two (2) facilities.one is to keep the notes serially and to get out the notes serially. The other is to keep the notes by name and to get out the notes by name. Doctors ,Businessmen can use this app.

omg! so easy to use, and you can go back & add things or remove multiple notes. I know you may be thinking, yeah so, but trust me I've had other note apps that were so difficult to add something or update it, that it felt like you were getting interrogated all for the want of adding something extra. I know that sounds dramatic, but with 5 kids now a single mum two jobs, I don't have time to be interrogated, I just want easy user friendly access to my notes and lists, and with this app I do. 😁😁

title: My Diary - Daily Notes, Journal & Mood Tracker
description:
Secret ideas, thoughts and moments should always remain secret and a private diary should always be intimate, beautiful and safe. 

Easy & simple Diary that you can use for quick note taking, for writing a journal, or as a private notebook.

My Personal Diary - Daily Notes, Journal & Mood Tracker gives powerful search functions is available to help you find diary entries by any keyword in the title or text/notes and filter results by date, tags. Preserve your special memories, store personal moments & memories or keep track of your life with help of this app. 

My Diary - Daily Notes, Journal & Mood Tracker App Feature:
- Keep your all moments, notes and ideas saved with you
- Add photos from your gallery or add a mood emoji to each entry and express your emotions easily!
- Lock & Protect your personal/private diary entries with a PIN code
- Attach & store unlimited amount of photos in your diary 
- Personalize UI with different UI colors & Themes
- Protect Privacy with data encryption & passcode 
- Powerful search and filter functions (Dates, Tags & title/notes)
- Easy to save & share your moments
- Use this diary app to make your own personal journal of daily events, appointments, secrets and feelings.
- Select your journey images to keep all-time with you
- Settings - Backup & Restore and make colorful memories with appearance
- Protect your Diary data with Passcodes
- Daily reminder to write your diary or journal

Disclaimer:
My Diary - Daily Notes, Journal & Mood Tracker app allows to take backup into local device and Google Drive. Local Backups are stored in your device only we don’t use it or upload into server. And Google drive backups are uploaded into your drive only

title: Private Journal - With Calendar, Lock, Themes 2020
description:
Private Journal comes with inbuild lock containing pin/password/pattern & fingerprint lock options. You can always be safe of the journal you write in it. With backup & restore feature you can never lose the data when you migrate to other devices. Colorful themes & night mode is present to make the app customizable to your taste.

MAIN FEATURES

Lock protection
- You can enable the inbuilt lock in the app.
- The lock options include pin, password, pattern & fingerprint lock
- You can set a backup pin in case you forget the main lock
- App will get locked even if you minimize the app.

Colorful Themes & Night Mode
- 16 different colors to choose from.
- Night mode for the pleasant usage during night.
- Auto night mode for a given interval.

Data backup and restore 
- Backup the whole journal to the device storage.
- Restore the data whenever needed.
- You can take multiple backups.

Rich Text Options
- Bold, italic, strike through
- Undo redo options.
- Foreground & background colors for the text

OTHER FEATURES
- Daily reminder to write journal.
- Attach images to diary entries.
- Save entries as PDF / text.
- Search with highlights.
- Voice to text.
- Swipe left/righ to navigate between journal entries.
- Calendar view.

Hope you enjoy using Private Journal

Your feedback is important to us. Email us to feedback@lucidnap.in

Thank you!

title: Diarium — Private Diary / Journal
description:
The most functional & feature-rich diary for for Android, iOS, macOS & Windows 10 lets you keep all your precious memories in one place and even reminds you to write down your experiences every day.

• Daily notifications remind you to write down your memories
• Attach pictures, drawings, audio recordings, files, tags, people, ratings or locations to your journal entries
• Display of your daily calendar events, weather and Google Fit information
• Integration of your social media activity (Twitter/Instagram/Facebook/Strava/...)
• Optional password/PIN/biometric protection of your diary
• Cloud Sync (OneDrive/Google Drive/Dropbox/WebDAV) keeps your entries updated cross-platform (Pro version only)
• Easy migration of your existing journal from other apps like Diaro, Journey, Day One, Daylio & many more
• Backup your diary with importing & exporting the database
• Export your diary entries as Word file (.docx + .txt) (Pro version only)

Free 7 day trial period of the Pro version included
descriptionHTML:
The most functional & feature-rich diary for for Android, iOS, macOS & Windows 10 lets you keep all your precious memories in one place and even reminds you to write down your experiences every day.

• Daily notifications remind you to write down your memories
• Attach pictures, drawings, audio recordings, files, tags, people, ratings or locations to your journal entries
• Display of your daily calendar events, weather and Google Fit information
• Integration of your social media activity (Twitter/Instagram/Facebook/Strava/...)
• Optional password/PIN/biometric protection of your diary
• Cloud Sync (OneDrive/Google Drive/Dropbox/WebDAV) keeps your entries updated cross-platform (Pro version only)
• Easy migration of your existing journal from other apps like Diaro, Journey, Day One, Daylio & many more
• Backup your diary with importing & exporting the database
• Export your diary entries as Word file (.docx + .txt) (Pro version only)

Free 7 day trial period of the Pro version included
summary: The most functional diary for all operating systems incl. cross-platform sync
recentChanges:
• New app logo
• New tag type "tracker" allows you to track custom values (e.g. weight, mood, ...)
• Mini-map in entry page now respects dark mode
• Multi-line suggestion lists for adding tags & people
• The search now also includes tags
• Various other small (performance) improvements
comments: Simple UI, easy to use, it provides exactly what I need except just one thing: I want to see collection of my pictures in one place (just like how you store maps, tags, etc in the left side area), so it's easy to find the journal entry based on picture. Because it's easier for me to remember the picture than words. If you kindly can add it, I would be very grateful. Thanks. (PS I will recommend this app to my husband)

This is a wonderful app. I used Day One for years but prefer this one now for its cross-platform capabilities. Syncing my journal between phone, laptop, desktop, and chromebook, so I can write whenever and wherever the mood strikes--is powerful. Improvements in the app make it better and easier to use, too. It wouldn't work on my Chromebook at first, for example, but works like a charm now. If you're looking for a powerful journaling app, look no further.

What a great app! I recently was at a company-wide chat on mindfulliness. At that event, I saw the potential benefits of journalling more regularly than I have been. Diarium is a perfect app for it. Whether I am using my PC, my phone or, most likely, my Surface Duo and stylus, Diarium is a great and easy way to capture as much about the day - my thoughts, activities, music, surroundings - as I know. Highly recommended.

I thought I was going to love it, until I started experiencing different issues. The second entery I made yesterday did not save & there is not a save box to select. I thought it would automatically save like the first one did, but I was wrong. And, I don't like that all I have listed on my calender on each day shows at the bottom where I text. It's a journal/diary, not a calender. I will not be keeping this app.

What a great app. I think the addition of tags and all the other attachments really is a bonus. I like how it syncs up between my phone and my computer through cloud storage, and the sync button is right at the top. I wish it were a little easier to add a separate entry for the same day, but it's not super hard. Finding a date is easy, I like the calendar layout, it's easy to navigate. Maybe some font variations and colors might add to it, but overall it's a really good app so far.

title: Cooking Diary®: Best Tasty Restaurant & Cafe Game
description:
Become the chef of your own restaurant in an exciting and FREE time management game! Cooking Diary is the best cooking game recognized by prestigious awards, loved and supported by MILLIONS OF PLAYERS around the world! Caution: this game can cause real culinary fever!

Welcome to Tasty Hills—a city where everyone loves to cook! It's your turn to keep a cooking diary. Help your grandpa save his family restaurant chain and build his reputation back up! Don't give your competitors a single chance to cook up evil plans, while you find true friends, manage restaurants and cafés, and cook top-quality dishes! Join fascinating events in the city's vibrant lifestyle, and gain fame as a great chef!

Features:
● COOK hundreds of delicious recipes from around the world!
● OPEN dozens of restaurants and cafés in all the districts of Tasty Hills and decorate them to your taste!
● AMAZE the whole world by trying on ultra-stylish looks!
● MAKE FRIENDS with cute and amazing pets of all kinds!
● WIN in various culinary competitions with lots of prizes!
● INTERACT with the residents of the city and immerse yourself in an exciting story!

🏆 Winner of the WEBBY PEOPLE'S VOICE AWARD 2020 for Strategy/Simulation Game
🏆 International Mobile Gaming Awards 2019 People's Choice Award winner

Play with your friends to cook and have fun together! Cooking Diary is a game that unites lovers of delicious and beautiful food from all over the world! Meet and chat with like-minded people—a love of cooking is a great starting point for a good friendship.

You can cook at restaurants and enjoy culinary adventures offline as well!

Tasty Hills is waiting for the grand opening of your restaurant! Etch your name in culinary history right now, Chef!

Join us on social media to keep up with the latest news from Tasty Hills:
https://www.facebook.com/CookingDiaryMYTONA/
https://www.youtube.com/CookingDiaryGame/
https://www.instagram.com/cookingdiary_official/
https://twitter.com/cookingdiary/
https://www.instagram.com/realvivisaur/
https://twitter.com/realvivisaur/
