summary: Stranger Things is now in Tasty Hills!
developerAddress: Clementi Central Post Office, PO Box 041 Singapore 911202
recentChanges:
Our Stranger Things limited-time event has started!

SPECIAL EVENTS

• Path to Glory: a pet Demogorgon and Steve Harrington as an assistant.

• Scoops Ahoy restaurant: help the characters from the series save the Starcourt Mall!

• Food Truck: take an amazing ride with Eleven and Max!

STRANGER THINGS ™/© Netflix. 2020. Used with permission.
comments: The feedback by developers that "levels are balanced and can be completed without purchases" is bogus. That's like saying you can walk 20 miles to work if you don't have a car. Technically true, practically untenable. Unless you don't care about quickly progressing through levels and don't mind saving up measly 2-ruby daily rewards...skip this. It's an awesome game but without making constant in-app purchases, it's too frustrating to be worth anyone's time. Also the house/pet features are dumb.

It's fun but can get get frustratingly difficult. It's annoying how many gems you need to upgrade your restaurants later when you barely get any. I wish they would change it so you can buy the pet stuff with coins instead of gems, because I don't want to waste my precious gems on them. I know you can get pet stuff via challenges but it can be difficult.

I did so much progress in this game, unlocking new restaurants and having so much equipment and upgraded stuff, I don't remember when or why, but I uninstalled it, now I remembered it and I installed it again, as expected everything was gone, I just made a character and did the tutorial, afterwards, it showed my saves, and it showed that other save and I thought it would bring back all the progress I'd done but it didn't, I just want to know how to restore everything.

I love how there seems to be endless levels without in-app purchases. But... when I first started to play upgrading the interior of the restaurants cost way less bank notes. I don't want to spend hard earned gems on that. I'm saving those for the kitchen. Why did you guys jack up the prices of things? Plus the new house thing. The shear amount of gems I'd need to purchase ONE piece of furniture is rediculous!! So i pretty much ignore that feature. And why do in-app purch cost so much?

I honestly really enjoyed this game to begin with. It was fun, interesting and I really like the guild feature. But I've been playing for maybe a week or so and now it's asking me to pay rubies to upgrade things. I don't have a lot of rubies and I think it's really silly that that are so expensive! You don't earn nearly enough rubies to actually make it worth the wait. The entire game is centered around them and it's really not fun to play anymore as everything gets more expensive! :(

title: Digital Diary - Notes, Reminder
description:
Digital Diary - Notes, Reminder:

Manage your day using Digital Diary

Use this application to keep notes, set multiple reminders to plan your day. Set different ringtone to identify it uniquly from other application. 

FEATURES:
Notes:
        - Add new notes
        - Edit/delete notes
        - Copy or Share notes
Reminders:
        - Add multiple reminders
        - Edit/delete reminders
        - Set custom ringtone from settings
        - Voice over reminder description using settings
Share App using share icon
descriptionHTML:
Digital Diary - Notes, Reminder:

Manage your day using Digital Diary

Use this application to keep notes, set multiple reminders to plan your day. Set different ringtone to identify it uniquly from other application.

FEATURES:
Notes:
- Add new notes
- Edit/delete notes
- Copy or Share notes
Reminders:
- Add multiple reminders
- Edit/delete reminders
- Set custom ringtone from settings
- Voice over reminder description using settings
Share App using share icon
summary: Application to add Notes, Reminders.
recentChanges: Performance improvement.
comments: Today Installed and used for DEMO TEST, after damo testing, I can say First Reminder I found which using only required permissions on user mobile, and giving GREAT OUTPUT superb work, I feel add little more option for reminder like modify timing Hourly, Daily, Weekly, throgh SINGLE TOUCH selection.

App is good ....i suggest one thing if u like plz check so that it will be more helpful for us.....BLUE COLOUR HAS TO BE THIN SO THAT WE CAN SEE MORE NOTES....AND FOR THAT BLUE COLOUR IF WE SLIDE TOWARDS LEFT FROM RIGHT RE SCHEDULE OPTION HAS TO BE APPEAR
IT is very bad app. I can't set the date to next day for reminder. Solve this simple error.

I tried many reminder apps before I stumbled upon this little gem. I was simply seeking an app that would send me a reminder. I don't need or want an app that will do everything else as well, including making me a cup of tea. This app works on the KISS principle ( Keep It Simple Stupid ) - perfect! I don't need an app that syncs with anything else, shares with anyone, backs up anywhere, won't work without permission to talk to me and read my emails, listen to my phone calls, know my location etc., and interrupts me with adverts. It does just what it is supposed to do - and does it well. My thanks to you, Mr. Garg.

Its awesome to take meeting notes or creating notes without worrying about carrying paper and pen which I sometime miss to have. Copy and share feature help to collate and share them in the end which is awesome. Its offline so secure. It also provide feature to set multiple reminders.

title: Ada – your health companion
description:
Ada helps you and your loved ones check symptoms and discover what might be causing them – day or night without an appointment. Whatever’s bothering you, from stomach problems to headache, Ada’s free symptom checker can help you find answers and let you know if you should see a doctor.

 Join the 10 million people who have already downloaded the world's most popular symptom check.  Doctors trained Ada for years, so you can get a prediagnosis within minutes. 


How do free symptom checks work?

You answer simple questions about your own or someone else’s health and symptoms.
Ada’s AI assesses your answers against its medical dictionary of thousands of disorders and medical conditions.
You receive a personalized assessment report that tells you what could be wrong and what to do next.


What can you expect from an assessment?

- Data privacy and security – we apply the strictest data regulations to protect you and keep your information private.
- Smart results – our core system connects medical knowledge with intelligent technology.
- Personalized health information – your guidance is personal to your unique health profile. 
- Assessments for loved ones – if you assess someone else, their information stays separate from your own. 
- Health checks – your assessments include information that may be relevant and helpful to your doctor. 
- 24/7 access – you can use the free symptom checker anytime, anywhere.


What can you tell Ada?

Ada answers medical questions of every kind. Here are some of the most common searches:

Symptoms
- Fever
- Allergic rhinitis
- Loss of appetite
- Headache
- Abdominal pain and tenderness 
- Nausea
- Fatigue
- Vomiting
- Dizziness


Medical conditions:
- Common cold 
- Influenza infection (flu)
- Viral sinusitis
- Diabetes
- Tension headache
- Migraine
- Chronic pain
- Fibromyalgia
- Arthritis
- Allergy
- Irritable bowel syndrome (IBS)
- Anxiety disorder
- Depression

Categories:
- Skin conditions such as rashes, acne, insect bites
- Pregnancy 
- Children’s health
- Sleeping problems
- Indigestion issues, such as vomiting, diarrhea
- Eye infections

Disclaimer
The Ada Health App is a Class I medical device in the European Union. Registration in other markets is pending.

We want to hear from you. If you have any feedback or just want to get in touch, reach us at hello@ada.com

developerAddress:
Ada Health GmbH
Karl-Liebknecht-Straße 1
10178 Berlin
Germany
recentChanges:
Thanks for managing your health with Ada.

Our doctors, engineers, and scientists have been working hard to bring you this update. Here you’ll see improvements like:

an expanded version of medical conditions and findings
an enhanced user experience.
comments: Pretty accurate heading. Again HEADING and not a diagnostic So people won't get it wrong about the app. Extremelly helpful, since the test I've inputed on was an already medical confirmed diagnosis and ADA has provided three oprions which one of them is the one I am on current medical treatment. So, I will definitely use it as a pre-docs visit since it helps to describe symptoms to the physician. First use no ads so far, which is great. Lets see if it stays this way.

I absolutely adore this app, I don't see myself ever getting rid of it. If you're ever unsure of what you have or need a guideline for what you may have, it is the most perfect app. It doesn't make you panic, it explains everything and is so calming when you're worried for the worst. Thank you to the creators! I adore this app and I'm so thankful for it!

This is a really awesome app, I use it every time I feel unwell. And it saved me so many trips to the doctor. The UI looks modern, descriptions of either symptoms or diseases is accurate while also easy to understand. And the best thing? it doesn't have ads, some kind of overpriced subscription or anything like that. this one is my must have.

It is generally a good app, but I put my symptoms in and it focused more on my mild headache and other small things than the actual problem that caused me to try this in the first place which was more important than that head ache, it does this quite a lot but other than this, it's quite good! It is a good way to track symptoms and I haven't seen many ads but it does need to work on the symptom assessment a bit more, but that said, it is hard to make that perfect but it can help.

This app is extremely helpful, I've used it dozens of times since I downloaded. Love that it remembers details about people other than me. It would be cool to have the option to import my medical records .... Not sure if that is something that would be possible to do? Either way, I've love this app, and it never takes long before I feel the need to download it onto a new phone.

title: ウンログ-うんちで健康管理！腸活で便秘対策
description:
70万DL突破の日本NO.1うんち記録アプリ「ウンログ」
便秘や下痢などのお腹の悩み解決をサポート！
便秘解消や健康管理・美容・ダイエットに活用しよう！
 
毎日の「うんち」を記録することで、便秘解消、美容・ダイエット、健康管理をサポートする【うんち（排便）記録アプリ】です。
 
----うんちは体からの大きなお便り----
最近話題の「腸活」は、結果がすぐにうんちとして現れます。
うんちを観察・記録することで、「腸活」の成果が見えてくる！成果が見えれば、どんどん続けられる！続ければキレイも健康も手に入る！
ウンログは、お腹の中からキレイと健康を目指すあなたをウンと応援します！

*-*-*ウンログって？*-*-*
毎日のうんち（お通じ）をアプリで記録！
お通じの状況を把握して、体調管理や便秘・下痢解消、ダイエットや筋トレなどに役立てましょう！
トイレで何気なく流してしまう毎日のうんちには、美容・健康・ダイエットに役立つ情報がたくさん！
形、色、量など、10秒で記録ができて、わかりやすくて楽しい！

さらに、うんちを記録するとポイントがゲットできちゃう^^
たくさんうんちを出せば、嬉しいプレゼントに交換できます！

*-*-*基本機能*-*-*
1.うんち記録
うんちの色、形、量、におい、すっきり感を記録できます。
記録情報でうんちをスコア化し、生活習慣の改善に役立てることができます。
レアキャラうんちなど、毎日のお通じを楽しく記録して、健康管理することができます。
メモ欄も付いているので、気になったこと（食事や運動、飲酒や睡眠、摂取カロリーや筋トレなど）は残すことができます。
うんちは病気のサインも出してくれます。
 
2. 腸活記録
毎日の腸活を記録できます。
腸活に役立つ食材やサプリメントの摂取を記録しておくことで、うんちの変化や腸内環境の改善に何が効果があったのかを気づけるようになります。
腸活商品とコラボしたお得な「腸活チャレンジ」キャンペーンも開催します！

3. おしっこ記録
おしっこの色、量を記録できます。
毎日のおしっこの状態で健康管理することができます。

4.カラダ記録
体重、体脂肪率、生理日、基礎体温、気分（メンタル）、肌の調子なども簡単に記録できます。
痩せたい方はダイエットに、妊娠したい方は妊活にも役立てられます。

5.カレンダー
記録情報をカレンダーで一目で見ることができます。
いつ出たのかがわかることで、お通じの悩み（便秘や下痢）や体重変化の傾向と対策を立てられます！
排便日誌の代わりにもなります。

6.ウンチップ
毎日のうんち記録をはじめ、いろいろな方法でウンチップが貯まります。
貯めたウンチップは、Amazonポイントに交換できちゃう^^

7.ウントーーク
リアルでは話しづらい、お通じの悩みを共有できます。
匿名だから、みんなでなんでも話せる。
心の便秘もスッキリ流しちゃいましょう！

8.パスコードロック
うんちや体重などの情報は誰にも見られたくない！
ウンログは安心安全のパスコードロック機能で、大切な情報を誰にも漏らしません。

*-*-*TV・雑誌・新聞・Web・ラジオなどで紹介多数！*-*-*
腸活や美容、ダイエット、健康のサポートアプリとしてさまざまなメディアに紹介されました！
・anan
・Oggi
・日経ヘルス
・美的
・NHK「あさイチ」　など

＜ウンログ利用規約＞
https://unlog.me/terms

＜ウンログバシーポリシー＞
https://unlog.me/privacy

＜障害・メンテナンス情報＞
https://unlog.co.jp/unlog/maintenance/

*-*-*お問い合わせ*-*-*
お客様からの貴重なご意見・ご感想としてスタッフもレビューを拝見しております。
不具合や使い方が分からないなど、お困りのことがありましたら、レビューへの投稿ではなく、

アプリ内の【不具合報告】より、メールにてお問い合わせください。

（多くのレビューをありがとうございます！とっても励みになってます！！）

※DL数値は2019年6月時点の数値です。
 
※※ ウンチップはログインしていないと使えません。
※※ 記録を残したい方は、必ずログインしてお使いください。
※※ ログインせずにアプリを使うこともできますが、アプリを削除したり、端末を変えたり、サーバがダウンしたりすると、記録が消えてしまう可能性があります。
※※ アップデート前にログインして記録をバックアップされるのをお勧めします。
※※ 障害・メンテナンス情報は「ウンログ 障害情報」で検索してください。URLは http://unlog.co.jp/unlog/maintenance/

腸活商品とコラボしたお得な「腸活チャレンジ」キャンペーンも開催します！

3. おしっこ記録
おしっこの色、量を記録できます。
毎日のおしっこの状態で健康管理することができます。

4.カラダ記録
体重、体脂肪率、生理日、基礎体温、気分（メンタル）、肌の調子なども簡単に記録できます。
痩せたい方はダイエットに、妊娠したい方は妊活にも役立てられます。

5.カレンダー
記録情報をカレンダーで一目で見ることができます。
いつ出たのかがわかることで、お通じの悩み（便秘や下痢）や体重変化の傾向と対策を立てられます！
排便日誌の代わりにもなります。

6.ウンチップ
毎日のうんち記録をはじめ、いろいろな方法でウンチップが貯まります。
貯めたウンチップは、Amazonポイントに交換できちゃう^^

7.ウントーーク
リアルでは話しづらい、お通じの悩みを共有できます。
匿名だから、みんなでなんでも話せる。
心の便秘もスッキリ流しちゃいましょう！

8.パスコードロック
うんちや体重などの情報は誰にも見られたくない！
ウンログは安心安全のパスコードロック機能で、大切な情報を誰にも漏らしません。

*-*-*TV・雑誌・新聞・Web・ラジオなどで紹介多数！*-*-*
腸活や美容、ダイエット、健康のサポートアプリとしてさまざまなメディアに紹介されました！
・anan
・Oggi
・日経ヘルス
・美的
・NHK「あさイチ」　など

＜ウンログ利用規約＞
https://unlog.me/terms

＜ウンログバシーポリシー＞
https://unlog.me/privacy

＜障害・メンテナンス情報＞
https://unlog.co.jp/unlog/maintenance/

*-*-*お問い合わせ*-*-*
お客様からの貴重なご意見・ご感想としてスタッフもレビューを拝見しております。
不具合や使い方が分からないなど、お困りのことがありましたら、レビューへの投稿ではなく、

アプリ内の【不具合報告】より、メールにてお問い合わせください。

（多くのレビューをありがとうございます！とっても励みになってます！！）

※DL数値は2019年6月時点の数値です。

※※ ウンチップはログインしていないと使えません。
※※ 記録を残したい方は、必ずログインしてお使いください。
※※ ログインせずにアプリを使うこともできますが、アプリを削除したり、端末を変えたり、サーバがダウンしたりすると、記録が消えてしまう可能性があります。
※※ アップデート前にログインして記録をバックアップされるのをお勧めします。
※※ 障害・メンテナンス情報は「ウンログ 障害情報」で検索してください。URLは http://unlog.co.jp/unlog/maintenance/

title: Presently: A Gratitude Journal
description:
Practice gratitude with this simple, always free, and private gratitude journaling app. 

Presently lets you:
⁕ Record daily entries of gratitude
⁕ Reflect back on your past moments of gratitude
⁕ Find motivation through quotes and prompts
⁕ Set daily reminders to continue your gratitude practice
⁕ Lock your entries with fingerprint or face id
⁕ Search your old entries
⁕ Share your entries with family and friends
⁕ Export/import your entries
⁕ Switch to your favorite color scheme

Presently is 100% free and ad free. All of your entries stay on your device and in your control.

summary: Celebrate your daily life with Presently, a free & private gratitude journal
recentChanges: We now support Croatian! Thank you to Antonietta for the translation.
comments: Recently, I went through an experience that really shook me. My pastor suggested thanking God daily in a deliberate, rather than my usual haphazard way, as a means of connecting with God less randomly. I found 'Presently' shortly after, and I make daily entries, reviewing them monthly. I have lots to be thankful for, and I am closer to God than before!

I really enjoy this app. I've been using it for a while now and it's simple, easy to use, and streamlined. It has customisation options which are great if you prefer apps with a "dark-mode", its otherwise uncluttered design and interface provide a calming and reassuring feel. I like the daily reminders and that it has milestones for how many days you've tracked. It's a nice way to reflect on my day and focus on the positives. Presently rocks, so please never change! You're already perfect!

Simple, focused & without advertising distraction. Colorful selection of background themes to choose from. Pithy quotes on gratitude, daily reminders & timely encouragements to develop the habit of gratitude. Pleasure to read & re-read past entries. Growing to be grateful for things past, thankful for the present and hopeful of the future - come what may, surely I can still find something to be thankful for. Simple app to build a lifelong, daily habit of gratitude. Highly recommended.

I've been using this for about a week and am really enjoying it so far. The best things are that it has a simple but aesthetic design and the fact that there are no ads. And although you can write whatever you want, being asked what you're grateful for is a great start and helps me begin positively which I struggle with but think it's good to do for mental health. I hope these things never change because it makes it so calming and stress free to use compared to other journalling apps!

Simple, easy to use, and convenient gratitude app. I love that it sends nightly reminders and there is nothing complicated about it. I look forward to getting my nightly reminders and I am now feeling so much more intuned to the things big and small I can show gratitude for daily. Love this so much!

title: Custom Journal: Prompts, Gratitude, Bullet Journal
description:
Custom Journal is a structured format journaling app. One where you are presented with writing prompts. This helps focus your thinking, making sure you ask yourself the right questions each day. 

However, sometimes those fixed questions are too rigid, they aren't exactly what you want. Why can't you ask different questions? As you change, the structure of your journal should change with you. Custom Journal allows you to create templates with customizable journal prompts of your own choosing. That way you can focus on what you want.

Custom Journal is very versatile, use it for:

Bullet Journal
A bujo, a system designed by Ryder Carroll, combines habits, todo lists, and a diary or daily log. Creative journaling to increase your productivity

Five Minute Journal
5 minute journaling is a journal method that focuses on focused prompts for quick and effective journaling. It combines gratitude, affirmations, and review. Only focus on your top priorities


Gratitude journal
Gratitude journal for daily reflection and staying positive. Being grateful will keep you positive and walk through life with a calm piece of mind.


Daily question journal
A decision journal to structure your thoughts. Make sure you are asking yourself the right questions.


A Daily Log & Habit Journal
Track anything. Use it as an exercise log or daily habit tracker.  Designed for daily reflection and review with habits built in. Develop habits that lead to long-term growth. Track your work each day and see that you are making progress towards your goals.


Features

★ Design your own custom journal template with custom journal prompts
★ Schedule your templates
★ Save your journals as images to save or share
★ Set daily reminders
★ Fully customizable fonts and themes. Change the background image
★ Simple and minimal interface
★ Search
★ Mood tracker that shows on the calendar
★ Add your photos
★ Add an extra layer of protection with a screen lock
★ Backup / restore your data, locally or to Google Drive
★ Home screen widget
★ Dark and light mode themes
★ Your data is free. Export your data as text.
★ Offline journaling. Your data lives on your device only (unless you choose to backup to  your own Google Drive)

Premium Features

Custom Journal is FREE. Premium features are offered for those who want some valuable extras and would like to support

Premium includes:

★ Books to organize your thoughts
★ Custom stats and graphs for your habits, multiple choice, and ratings
★ Export your journals to PDF
★ Automatically backup your images and data to Google Drive
★ Auto sync between your Android devices
★ Access to hundreds of fonts
★ Notification reminders for each template

I'm always available for questions and feedback and would love hearing from you. Email: jerry@customjournalapp.com

comments: I like this app alot. I just have two requests. 1. Please add tagging entries to make things easier to find. 2. It would be nice to able to add images to more than just the main entry on a single day. I mean if you have more than one templet box on that day ... I'd like to decorate each with images. I love the unlimited books and the ability to change the main background. It would also be nice to maybe be able to change backgrounds for each journal book. Overall ...a great app!!!
So far I love this app and its customization options. And the developer was super responsive when I asked about password capabilty which there is! Thank you for an awesome app!

Love this app! So customisable. Will make Journaling more effective and easier to stick to. Easy to use as well! Love that you can use fingerprint to unlock access to the app. Other features I would like to see: - Daily motivational quotes. - Acces via web site. One of the best apps I have downloaded. Well done!
Need to customize widget font size, header color and name, remove icons, transparency. Must allow multiple entries in a day.

Wow! So I installed the app because there were always feedback to questions or comments in these reviews. I am not disappointed. It is really user friendly and works for just about everything I need. I was wondering if i missed a style or input for adding birthdays? The birthday section must appear daily but the names must repeat yearly???

title: Evernote - Notes Organizer & Daily Planner
description:
Capture ideas when inspiration strikes. Find information fast. Share notes with anyone. From meetings and projects to web pages and to-do lists—with Evernote, everything’s in one place.
 
Evernote syncs to all your devices, so you can tackle action items on the go. Express yourself clearly with easy-to-use formatting options, and find what you need quickly with filtered searches and results as you type. 

Note: The new version of Evernote is available for Android version 9 and newer. Users of Android version 8 and older will receive the Evernote Legacy app. The new Evernote for Android will be made available for Android versions 6, 7, and 8 in a future update.
 
---

"Use Evernote as the place you put everything … Don’t ask yourself which device it’s on—it’s in Evernote" – The New York Times
 
“When it comes to taking all manner of notes and getting work done, Evernote is an indispensable tool.” – PC Mag
 
---

CAPTURE IDEAS
• Write, collect, and capture ideas as searchable notes, notebooks, memos, checklists, and to-do lists.
• Keep journals capturing the events and milestones of your daily life.
• Clip interesting articles and web pages to read or use later. 
• Take notes and create notepads in a variety of formats: text, sketches, photos, audio, web clippings, and more.
• Use the camera to effortlessly scan, digitize, and organize your paper documents, business cards, whiteboards, handwritten notes, and drawings.
• Attach docs, PDFs, photos, and audio.
 
GET ORGANIZED
• Create separate notebooks to organize your memos, receipts, bills, and invoices.
• Find anything fast—Evernote's powerful search can even find text in images and handwritten notes.
• Set reminders to keep on top of activities and write to-do lists. 

ACCESS ANYWHERE
• Sync your notes and notebooks automatically across any Chromebook, phone, or tablet.
• Start your work on one device and continue on another without missing a beat.

EVERNOTE IN EVERYDAY LIFE
• Make personal to-do lists to keep your thoughts organized. 
• Go paperless by scanning receipts and important documents.

EVERNOTE IN BUSINESS
• Keep everyone up to date by capturing meeting notes and sharing notebooks with your team.
• Use it as your ultimate planner, organizer, and notepad at work.
 
EVERNOTE IN EDUCATION
• Keep up with lecture notes so you don’t miss important details.
• Use it as a planner and organizer to keep track of lecture notes, exams, and assignments.
 
---

Also available from Evernote:
 
EVERNOTE PREMIUM
• 10 GB of new uploads each month
• Unlimited number of devices
• Access your notes and notebooks offline
 
Price may vary by location. Subscriptions will be charged to your credit card through your Google Play account. Where applicable, your subscription will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Subscriptions may not be cancelled for refund except as provided in Evernote's Commercial Terms. Manage your subscriptions in Account Settings after purchase.

---

Privacy Policy: https://evernote.com/legal/privacy.php
Terms of Service: https://evernote.com/legal/tos.php
Commercial terms: https://evernote.com/legal/commercial-terms

summary: Notepad, planner & daily organizer to take notes, save ideas and share memos.
recentChanges:
Fixed:
* We came; we saw; we conquered bugs.
comments: I have started to use the application in 2009. Then I liked it. In addition to this, I've decided to purchase for premium, created another account and shared my notebooks with my premium account. Then I couldn't see my shared notebooks on the web and mobile. I've been struggling with technical support for 2 weeks. They have promised for full technical support, I'm writing but they haven't returned for 5 days. Unfortunately, I'm switching back to Microsoft Onenote.

After the major update to the app, the note texts are not readable anymore. Looks like Evernote messed up the text color setting in Android. My noted works fine in iPad and on PC. I always leave the text color as default and never changed it. However, in Android, text is in dark grey in Dark Mode, and light grey in Light mode. So the text color is always very close to the background color no matter which mode I choose. And this MAJOR issue has been there for at least a week!

Ruined after the recent upgrade roll out: 1) Notes take ages to load up. 2) All the fonts which used to be available have now disappeared and all my notes are suddently in Sans Serif. At least it wasn't Comic Sans. 3) None of the desktop keyboard shortcuts I used to use which made this app efficient to use have disappeared. 4) It needs to be online to work - unnecessary and annoying Probably other things have gone wrong - it's only been a few hours since the upgrade. It wasn't broken - why try to fix it?? I've been a Premium subscriber for years - now considering cancelling & switching.

I used to love this app and I use it a lot for work and personal info organisation. The latest update is an utter disaster for me. It requires a constant internet connection, which I - and millions of other people on this planet - don't have. I used to be able to work on notes whether I was online or offline - a helpful little red exclamation symbol would appear on the sync item when the app couldn't sync because the internet was down, so I would be careful not to change to working on the same note on a different device. Now the app insists on me reloading the note when the internet is down and wipes out my latest edits. This is useless! I don't want to have to remove the sync setting as I do want the app to sync regularly when I'm online. If this continues to be a problem I will, finally, have to relinquish my subscription and migrate to a different tool. (NB the Windows 10 app update doesn't even appear to have the option to change the sync setting at all - in fact the settings menu seems to have disappeared completely!!!)

After the recent update, I've lost all my notes from the past 1 week simply because they had not automatically synced. The update was automatic btw. Pathetic experience, and quite stressful too. I was thinking of upgrading to premium but will definitely not do it now, after realizing my content can be deleted anytime without a fair warning.

title: Write Now - Notepad
description:
[★ NEW ★] A major new version for Write Now is coming soon. We've redesigned the app from the ground up to bring you a more modern UI and new features including combined note types, trash folder, better encryption, faster NowPad launches, and much more. Join the beta program (below) to get a preview of the new design today!

[NOTICE] If you are experiencing instant crashes when opening the app, please see below for a possible solution.

Write Now is the easiest and fastest way to take notes without leaving your current app. To jot a note simply drag your finger from the hotspot to the center of the screen and let go!

The NowPad lets you take notes on top of any opened app and runs quietly in the background when not in use.

Write Now features three different types of notes: text, checklist, and voice; and with more to come, Write Now will be your one-stop note app!

Make accessing your notes even easier by pinning them to your notification bar or adding a home-screen widget.

Secure your notes by setting a password and Write Now will automatically encrypt your note based on your unique password.

★ FEATURES ★
- Take notes without leaving your current app
- Three types of notes: text, checklist, and voice
- Organize your notes in easy-to-use folders
- Pin notes to your notification bar
- Create home-screen widgets
- Lock and encrypt notes with a password
- Easy sharing and exporting features
- Runs in the background quietly without draining battery or processing power

★ USES ★
You can takes while you're...
- taking a call.
- reading an article.
- checking your email.
- browsing the Internet.
- playing a game.
- looking up directions.
- watching a video.
- taking a picture.
- listening to music.
- doing anything!

More information at http://www.aerodroid.com/apps/write_now.php

NOTICE: We have recently discovered an issue with Write Now that affects some Android 6.0+ that may cause Write Now to crash upon opening. If you are running an Android 6.0+ device, please ensure that you grant ALL permissions to Write Now in your Settings. To do this, open your phone's Settings app, go to "App Manager" (or "Applications"), tap on the menu button (may look like three dots in toolbar), choose "Configure apps", choose "Draw over other apps", then ensure that "Write Now" is listed and has the "Yes" permission enabled. These instructions may differ from device to device. If you need further assistance or experiencing other difficulties, please contact us.
descriptionHTML:
[★ NEW ★] A major new version for Write Now is coming soon. We've redesigned the app from the ground up to bring you a more modern UI and new features including combined note types, trash folder, better encryption, faster NowPad launches, and much more. Join the beta program (below) to get a preview of the new design today!

[NOTICE] If you are experiencing instant crashes when opening the app, please see below for a possible solution.

Write Now is the easiest and fastest way to take notes without leaving your current app. To jot a note simply drag your finger from the hotspot to the center of the screen and let go!

The NowPad lets you take notes on top of any opened app and runs quietly in the background when not in use.

Write Now features three different types of notes: text, checklist, and voice; and with more to come, Write Now will be your one-stop note app!

Make accessing your notes even easier by pinning them to your notification bar or adding a home-screen widget.

Secure your notes by setting a password and Write Now will automatically encrypt your note based on your unique password.

★ FEATURES ★
- Take notes without leaving your current app
- Three types of notes: text, checklist, and voice
- Organize your notes in easy-to-use folders
- Pin notes to your notification bar
- Create home-screen widgets
- Lock and encrypt notes with a password
- Easy sharing and exporting features
- Runs in the background quietly without draining battery or processing power

★ USES ★
You can takes while you're...
- taking a call.
- reading an article.
- checking your email.
- browsing the Internet.
- playing a game.
- looking up directions.
- watching a video.
- taking a picture.
- listening to music.
- doing anything!

More information at http://www.aerodroid.com/apps/write_now.php

NOTICE: We have recently discovered an issue with Write Now that affects some Android 6.0+ that may cause Write Now to crash upon opening. If you are running an Android 6.0+ device, please ensure that you grant ALL permissions to Write Now in your Settings. To do this, open your phone's Settings app, go to "App Manager" (or "Applications"), tap on the menu button (may look like three dots in toolbar), choose "Configure apps", choose "Draw over other apps", then ensure that "Write Now" is listed and has the "Yes" permission enabled. These instructions may differ from device to device. If you need further assistance or experiencing other difficulties, please contact us.
summary: Take notes without leaving your current app with Write Now.
recentChanges: Fixed security issue
comments: This is my favourite note taking app ever. I like that it has the ability to name every note by the date and time, create folders and subfolders, save to card or internal memory as text, which then I can automatically back up everything in Google Drive. I guess the only option I would suggest to the developer to add to this app would be to back up automatically to Google Drive. Great work!

I'm really kind of blown away at how handy this app is... It's just about perfect, I use it everyday on multiple phones and tablets... I also just used and love the recordable audio-note ability...! Hopefully in the future it will be able to do speech-to-text...! Thanks so much for your app, Peeps...

Love the app, suggestions, I would love to be able to connect others to my to do list. I do hate that if I change phones I lose all my info. Love the convenience of opening up from anywhere in my phone.
This app has been a nightmare, I spend hours writing, it has crashed a multitude of times now and it takes your writing with it straight to hell . I'm not happy %
I would give it 5 stars, but the new update won't let me access my previous files. I have 100's of files and lost them. Used to love this app

title: Diary & notes
description:
Diary and notes easily helps you write down your own thoughts or private moments that need to be kept secret. You no longer need heavy notebooks, just download Diary and notes to write down your daily diary, the most beautiful and unforgettable moments you want to store, or the messages you want to save to remind yourself. Diary and notes help you focus on what matters the most and access the information easily when you want to see.
With Diary and notes, you can note down all your thoughts or all future plans that will go with you daily, remind you and become a totally reliable friend. The friend is always waiting for you to share and never judge you. Diary and notes is always with you in need. All you need to do is open the application and write down your feelings.
Moreover, if you are a busy person with a lot of work, there will be many things to record and keep in mind continuously. Then, Diary and notes will help you and become your useful right arm. The app helps you take notes of things to save, to-do lists, photos to be saved in moments. Or you can draw out a to-do list, Diary and Notes will help you save them all and also remind you at the time you want it to remind you.
*Key features making a great application:
An easy-to-use and beautiful interface
   - Easy-to-use interface, direct to enhance user experience.
   - View all diaries and notes on one same list which are intelligently separated. Or you can filter, and arrange as you want the application to display.
   - See the photos and the mood of the diary you wrote, which makes you remember the beautiful memories.
   - Mood set with super cute and attractive Emoji
   - Easy to add new, edit or delete
   - Create quick notes by taking photos
   - Create quick notes by drawing.
   - Smart searching tool, easily access to what you want to find.
   - Export to PDF files and send notes through channels such as Email, FB, SMS, Bluetooth, etc.
   - Smart reminder, you will never forget anything
Secured and private
   - Diary and Notes is confident to be an absolutely safe app. The application provides users with a variety of security options: Number Type, Character Type, Drawing Style, Fingerprint / Face, etc.
   - The application will protect your files from unauthorized access.
   - Update and recover passwords with Recovery email.
   - Smart lock.
Organize your work and write a diary quickly and simply
   - Write, collect information with photos, sketches, and then create smart notes with Diary and Notes
   - Experience the diary writing tools and notes as if you are using computer documents with utilities such as checklist creating, Bold, Italic, Underline, Align, Distance between lines, Change font color, Create List in 123 or Heading styles.
   - Use super-fast camera, then, edit, cut and insert notes
   - Write a smart diary, write for the past, and write for the current day.
Write diary lines or write stories of your life with Diary and Notes. Moments, thoughts, important information, and even sudden ideas will be saved fully and quickly with Diary and Notes
We are trying hard to develop the application to bring you the best experience. Download Diary and Notes to experience, and rate us 5 stars on Google Play store. If you find any technical issues on the application, please email or give us a comment about them.

title: ColorNote Notepad Notes
description:
ColorNote® is a simple and awesome notepad app. It gives you a quick and simple notepad editing experience when you write notes, memos, e-mails, messages, shopping lists and to-do lists. Taking notes with ColorNote® Notepad is easier than any other notepad or memo pad app.

* Notice *
- If you cannot find the widget, then please read the FAQ below.
- When you're finished using the notepad, an automatic save command preserves your individual note.

* Product Description *
ColorNote® features two basic note taking formats, a lined-paper styled text option, and a checklist option. Add as many as you want to your master list, which appears on the app's home screen each time the program opens. This list may be viewed in traditional ascending order, in grid format, or by note color.

- Taking a Note -
Serving as a simple word processing program, the text option allows for as many characters as you're willing to type. Once saved, you can edit, share, set a reminder, or check off or delete the note through your device's menu button. When checking off a text note, the app places a slash through the list's title, and this will be displayed on the main menu.

- Making To-do List or Shopping List -
In the checklist mode, you can add as many items as you'd like and arrange their order with drag buttons activated in the edit mode. After the list is finished and saved, you may check or uncheck each line on your list with a quick tap, which will toggle a line slash. If all items have been checked, then the list's title is slashed as well.


* Features *
- Organize notes by color (color notebook)
- Sticky note memo widget (Put your notes on your home screen)
- Checklist notes for To do list & Shopping list. (Quick and simple list maker)
- Checklist notes to get things done (GTD)
- Organize your schedule by note in calendar
- Write a diary and journal in calendar
- Password Lock note : Protect your notes with passcode
- Secured backup notes to SD storage
- Supports online back up and sync. You can sync notes between phone and tablet.
- Reminder notes on status bar
- List/Grid View
- Search notes
- Notepad supports ColorDict Add-on
- Powerful task reminder : Time Alarm, All day, Repetition.(lunar calendar)
- Quick memo / notes
- Wiki note link : [[Title]]
- Share notes via SMS, e-mail or Twitter

* Online backup and sync cloud service *
- Notes will be encrypted before uploading notes by using the AES standard, which is the same encryption standard used by banks to secure customer data.
- It does not send any of your notes to the server without you signing in.
- Sign-in with Google or Facebook.

* Permissions *
- Internet Access: For online backup & sync notes
- Storage :  For backup notes to the storage of the device
- Prevent phone from sleeping, control vibrator, automatically start at boot: For reminder notes

* FAQ *
Q: How do you put a sticky note widget on the home screen?
A: Go to the home screen and hold down your finger on an empty space and choose widget, Color Note will then be desplayed so you can stick on the page. 

Q: Why don't the widget, the alarm and notes remider functions work?
A: If the app is installed on the SD card, your widget, reminder, etc. will not work properly because Android doesn't support these features when installed on an SD card! If you have already moved the app to an SD card, but want those features, then you have to move the app back on the device and reboot your phone.

Settings - Applications - Manage Applications - Color Note - Move to Device

Q: Where are backed up notes data on the SD card?
A: '/data/colornote' or '/Android/data/com.socialnmobile.dictapps.notepad.color.note/files' on SD card 

Q: I forgot my master password. How can I change it?
A: Menu → Settings → Master Password → Menu Button → Clear Password. You will lose your current locked notes when you clear the password!

Q: How can I create todo list note?
A: New - Select checklist note - Put items - Save. Tap an item to strikethrough.

comments: This is an amazing app! I use it every day!! My primary use for this app is reminders because my memory is so horrible. I have a reoccurring reminder to even set an alarm every night. For most of my reminders I need room for further notes or instructions, so this app works great for me. I make lists for various things and I really like that there's a feature that you can check things off on the list. It's satisfying to finish something, tap it, and its automatically crossed out.

I LOVE color note!! I have used it for several, several years now, with multiple phones and it has transferred seamlessly to each one. I like it so much better than any other note app I've ever used. I still have a note saved on my app from 2011 when I went into labor with my daughter and I was timing contractions. This app is simple, user friendly, has convient options to use for shopping trips, work list, ect. This busy mom of 4 HIGHLY recommends!

No way of backing up anything whatsoever unless you sign in with a Google account. In 5 years I've not had any issues with this app until now. Everything in the backup section has been disabled to force me to backup online with a Google account. The entire offline backup section no longer works, even signing up with an email address is broken and redirects to Google. I would've said these are bugs, but the offline backup section says 'sign in required' so I'm not so sure.

This app is a must for maintaining notes, catalogues, & other items that require a checklist, without being bothered by pesky ads or such. It is overall fine, only thing is that it sets the very first of line of a note as the title of the note which is undesirable at times. Is there any option to do away with this? Recommended app.👍👍

I've tried other notepad apps and this is my favorite. The color coding feature is extremely helpful, as is the fact that the notes are automatically saves as soon as I exit the program. Even better, my notes are synced across my devices so I never lose anything. This app does everything it's supposed to do, and does it well, without any obtrusive ads or annoyances. That, in my opinion, earns it five stars.

title: Notepad - Write Notes, Checklists & Reminders
description:
Notepad is an easy-to-use free notes app for Android, optimized for after-call note taking. This clear and simple notepad app allows you to make quick notes and checklists to help organize your life with great ease.

SIMPLE AND CLEAR ✔
This quick notepad allows you to sort notes by date or title to help you keep them in order and a useful search function will help you find specific notes if you have many saved in your list of notes. 

SHARE AND CONNECT ☝
All notes can easily be shared with others via your email account or various social media platforms, and a smart link to phone calls allows you to write notes or memos immediately following every phone call made or received. Connect all aspects of your communication with this smart Notepad app!

ORGANIZE YOUR TASKS ✍
The useful checklist function allows you to create clear checklists such as to do lists, shopping lists or task lists, and also allows you to cross out items on the list when they are completed without having to delete them, in case you need to refer to the original list later.

SMART CONNECTION TO PHONE CALLS ✆
Following every phone call Notepad is activated on your phone, allowing you to quickly make notes so that you don’t forget anything important from the call. An advanced Caller ID feature also displays detailed information about the call. Details such as caller name, number, time and much more are displayed and serve as a useful reminder when making notes.

NOTEPAD KEY FEATURES ✎
✒ Clearly presented notes which can be sorted by date or title. Quickly and easily edit, save and delete notes at any time.
✒ Easy checklist function where completed items can be marked as ‘done’.
✒ Useful search function for those difficult-to-find notes to save time.
✒ Sort your notes by date or title.
✒ Backup & restore notes so that you don’t lose any important information. You can backup directly to your phone or to Google Drive.
✒ Quickly share notes with others via email, SMS or various social media platforms including Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, WhatsApp, Messenger, Skype and LinkedIn.
✒ Create notes quickly following phone calls with a handy quick link to Notepad after every call made or received.
✒ Identify unknown callers with the advanced caller ID feature and see detailed call information - useful when making notes after phone calls!

For your privacy and data protection we do not have access to any of your notes or store any of the information contained within them. Therefore, we recommend that you regularly use the useful backup feature on this app to avoid the accidental loss of any important information.

Install Notepad today and organize your life with this easy-to-use notepad application and enjoy a hassle-free time. Never be stuck without a pen and paper again!

title: Super Slime Simulator: Satisfying ASMR & DIY Games
description:
Play with slime on your mobile device. Stretch it, squish it, knead it, pop it - just like you would with real slime or goo. Enjoy that oddly satisfying feeling without the mess or sticky fingers!
With tons of slimes to choose from, this app is for slime noobs and pro slime veterans, young and old, boys and girls! You can even take animated pictures of your slime and share them with your friends using your favorite social media apps.

App features:

- Play with your simulated slime right on your phone.
- Realistic slime simulation: Stretch it, squish it, knead it, pop it - just like real slime!
- Rich slime gallery: Gooey, fluffy, cheesy, glittering and many more.
- Introducing: Magical Slimes! Kids, don’t try to make these at home - because you can’t!
- The Ugliest & Yuckiest: Flesh, brains, worms and more - these WILL gross out your friends.
- Not all slimes were created equal: Unique texture, color and behavior for each slime.
- DIY! Create your very own slime. Choose from multiple materials, colors and even add glitter, foam and other amazing stuff.
- Fun area: enjoy great slime activities including: Guessing Game & Slime Painter.
- Shake it till you make it: Shake your phone to undo stretches.
- Oddly Satisfying Sounds: Turn up the volume and listen to your slime squishing as you touch it.
- Take animated pictures of your slime and share them with everyone!

FOLLOW US at
Instagram @superslimesimulator

- Take animated pictures of your slime and share them with everyone!

comments: I love this app. The slimes realistic, and when you tap or drag the screen, the slime reacts as if it was a real slime. It is so satisfying that it makes me feel like I am actually touching slime. All the other mini-games are great too. There are so many ingredients to choose from. But it does take long to collect them. And I do not care about ads. People who complain about ads are impatient. I am yet to try Squishy Magic. Please add a thermochromic slime that changes color when touched.

This game is surprisingly awesome. Especially for those of you who are a fan of slime. I am a big fan of slime and I also enjoy making them so I love making, naming and choosing slime in this game even if you do it virtually. Just one thing, though, I noticed that one of the amazing prizes is very hard to get. Which is the thing I always hope most for. You will find out after playing this game. So what are you waiting for? Install this, right now!

This game is great! It teaches you the ingredients to how to make different slimes, and you get to actually play with the slime you made inside the game when you finish it! You have decorations and colors you can add to your slimes, and its easy to get slime types, colors, and decorations! This is super satysfying ASMR. Would i recommend this game? YES, DEFINETLY, ABSOLUTLY

I love it!! <3 Its super realistic and relaxing and it relieves my anxiety and stress everything is just so relaxing!!! I definitely recommend this to everyone its amazing and I love it you guys did a great job on this app its perfect! But one thing after playing with the game for a few minutes it gives you an ad but they're really easy to skip and there not that long :) ♡♡♡

This game is the best!!! :) Its so satisfying and stress relieving and you can make lots of different slimes and you can watch ads for coins game is so fun and it is fun to collect all the Slime colors decorations and slime I really like to collect the Slime colors because there are so many and all them are beautiful I already have half of them already i would love to have all of them and theres NO PROBLOMS :)))))

title: Samsung Notes
description:
With Samsung Notes, 
you can create notes containing texts, images with footnotes, voice recordings, and music. Moreover, you can share your notes easily to SNS.
Previously made any memos from S Note and Memo also can be imported into Samsung Notes.
Samsung Notes provides various brush types and color mixers, so that you can draw fabulous paintings like professional painters.
You may also share your paintings at PEN.UP right away.
Samsung Notes is a hub for all your hand-written notes, sketches, drawings.


Creating notes
Tap + icon at the bottom of the main screen of Samsung Notes to create notes.

Locking notes
1.Tap the More options button on the main screen of Samsung Notes, select Settings, 
  then select Lock notes to create a password.
2.Create a password, then tap the note you want to lock.
3.Tap the More options button while viewing a note, then select Lock.

Adding text
Tap keyboard icon at the top of the screen to enter text using the keyboard. 
Use the Rich text toolbar to edit the style of the text.

Adding handwriting
Tap Handwriting icon at the top of the screen to add handwriting. 
Handwritten text can be recognised. You can also use handwriting to search for keywords in notes.

Adding drawings
Tap drawing icon at the top of the screen to create drawings.

Adding image and voice recordings
Tap image icon at the top of the screen to insert images. 
Tap Voice recording icon at the top of the screen to insert voice recordings.

Using pen settings
Select from various pen types, sizes, and colours.

Erasing handwriting
Tap eraser icon at the bottom of the screen, then tap or swipe your finger over the handwriting you want to erase.

Using Selection mode
Tap selection icon at the bottom of the screen, then select an area of handwriting. 
You can then move the selected area, adjust its size, and more.

Using brush settings
Select from various brush types and colours. 
Tap the selected brush to view the brush settings again and change more settings such as the size and opacity.
Tap color icon, then select the colour you want to draw with.

Using Smart Switch.
Use Smart Switch to import S Note and Memo data from other devices.

Using Samsung account.
1.Tap the More options button while on the main screen of Samsung Notes, select Settings, then select Import data.
2.Select S Note or Memo data saved using your Samsung account, then tap the DONE button.

Syncing notes via Samsung Cloud
1.Tap the More options button while on the main screen of Samsung Notes, select Settings, 
  then select Sync with Samsung Cloud.
2.Register with or sign in to Samsung Cloud using your Samsung account. 
  Samsung Notes data will be synced automatically.

Creating notes while screen off
Detach the S Pen while the screen is turned off to create screen off memos.

Keyword : SDOC, Note, Memo

----------------------------------------------------------------------
Notice : Regarding the App Access Privilege

The following permissions are required for the app service. 
For optional permissions, the default functionality of the service is turned on, but not allowed.

Required permissions
• Storage: Used to save or load note files

Optional permissions
• Telephone: Used to check device-unique identification information for providing app update
• Microphone: Used to record the voice to be inserted into the note
• Camera: Used to take photos to be inserted into the note
• Contacts: Used to read account information to sync with your account

comments: It's very basic, it works perfectly and is useful, it has all the basic requirements a notes on a phone needs and I don't see any problems with it, the only reason I'm not giving it a 5 star is because of the art tool, I feel like animation should be part of it, even if it was a simple animation feature it would be good, this app honestly is really good I just feel it could be better.

Used to be a really useful app. Since the update the app request a add-on to open my previous notes. Unfortunately the add-on installation keep crashing, rendering the my files impossible to access. UPDATE - Converting the old notes prevent the add-on installation to be triggered. This way you can keep using your old-converted notes as usual. This add-on is about, but it crash the app every time. Just convert your notes and forget about the whole add-on thing.

The new update is terrible. I am losing my categories and coding. I miss the ability to save or discard. It's a phone so hitting keys by mistake is sooo common and I need that discard to undo. Also, when you paste pics into a note the text wrapping is completely uncontrollable. The pics move around into unrelated sections of the document. And why do I need pages in a digital notepad? And when pages get added but you delete what is on them the blank pages just stay there. It's an OCD nightmare.

New update completely ruined the experience. I always bold out certain words and key terms in my notes to remember them, but now the bold button is 3 clicks away whereas it used to be right below my finger while I'm typing, moved to a now extremely inconvenient placement considering I'm bolding words every few seconds. Page breaks were completely unnecessary and ruin the structure of my notes, there should be an option to enable and disable them at my own will.

I hate this new update, why do we have to convert our notes to this new version and why don't we have the flexibility of still using the old format to write our stuff? Some of us don't adjust well. I like some features that are in the new update though but let's have some flexibility at least. I use the app to write music and this has been very hard to do given the format that I've been accustomed to using. Please do something about this, thanks.

title: Lily Diary : Dress Up Game
description:
1. Lily Diary is a dress-up game where you can decorate avatars and backgrounds.

2. You are free to put your saved avatars anywhere you want!

3. There are varied functions such as Mirror & Layer Switch, Drag & Drop, pretty animations, and plenty of storage. Please see Menu → Tutorial before you play.

4. Create your own unique story with many outfits, items, animals, speech bubbles and text.

5. Share your adorable avatars and background images with your friends on Social Media.


※ As the data is saved to your device, if you delete the game, all saved data will also be deleted.

※ In-app purchase data is saved to the server, so you can restore purchase data when you re-install the game.

※ If installation fails or you are unable to check purchased items, please try the following :

▶ Device Settings → Apps → Google Play Store → Storage → Clear Data & Clear Cache

comments: ADORABLE I love this game so much! It's so soft and elegant, I love when a new idea pops in my head for a character! Here's a few ideas.....Number 1: Make a group wall! I think it would be cool to show others your characters and they can leave like and comments....Number 2: I want to be able to change weight & height of my characters I think that would be so cool!....Number 3: Add a contest like every week put a theme like ( Scary ) Then all of the people have to compete to make a scary outfit!

There is no option to clone looks and outfits! I was hoping to make multiple saves of the same character with different outfits, but it looks like I can't do that. Also the saving system is really confusing. There are two different places to save but only one of them actually does anything.

I installed this game based off of my prior enjoyment of Pastel Friends and it's safe to say this game is amazing! I absolutely love how clothes aren't based on gender as well as how cute they are, not to mention the excess of accessories as well as diversity in hair and skin tones/colors. This game will keep my interest for a long time, thank you for this creation!🖤

Super cute and fun! Made an avatar for my bf and I, and we set it as our wallpaper <3 Simple to use (although a bit tricky when trying to line things up equally, a snap grid function would be awesome!) and cute add on packs. However, I'd love to see more color choices for clothing and accessories. Very frustrating trying to recreate people but lack a particular colour for the right item. Also, more male stuff pls! Overall, lovely app and a bit less chibi than the previous games like Lily Story.

Its a AMAZING game!I actually really like that you can mirror (or whatever you call it)your character its actually really funny in my opinion😂,but its actually pretty laggy😣but i think its just my ipad cause i have so many apps and also i cant pick a color of the outfit i want (or maybe i can but im just dumb)and even the post of the character i made(or i can but im just dumb)but over all really FUNNN game!(but i still think how is it a *DIARY*?)

title: Constipation Diary
description:
©NEUROGUT 2018 CONSTIPATION STOOL INSTRUMENT
Basic description: The Constipation Stool Instrument (CSI) is a list of patient-reported symptoms for the evaluation of bowel problems associated with constipation. Constipation affects 15% of the US population. Constipation comprises of multiple symptoms that describe the frequency and difficulty with bowel movements. Because of the irregular nature of bowel habit, the multiple and variable symptoms, and difficulty with remembering symptoms as well as recall bias, it is important to prospectively assess patient-reported bowel symptoms, for use in clinical trials, and for the assessment of patients with constipation.
Authors:
Neurogut Incorporated (USA)
Objective:
To assess the presence of and severity of patient-reported bowel and abdominal symptoms related to constipation, for use in clinical trials, and assessment of patients with constipation
Therapeutic Areas:
Gastrointestinal and Digestive System Diseases
Pathological conditions, Signs and Symptoms
Therapeutic indication:
Constipation
Dyssynergic defecation
Anorectal and Colorectal diseases
Type of Clinical Outcome Assessment (COA)
Patient Reported Outcome (PRO) assessment
Original language
English for the USA
Bibliographic reference for the original questionnaire:
Meduri K, Brown CK, Attaluri A, Valestin J, Rao SSC. Validation of a Prospective Stool Diary for Assessment of Constipation.  Neurogastroenterol Motil 2011; 23 (Supplement 1): 21.






Administration:
The Constipation Stool Instrument (CSI) is a daily, self-administered questionnaire for the assessment of bowel habit. The subject is instructed to fill out all 11 items for one day by responding on each screen presented, and as it relates to each bowel movement.  It takes 1 minute to complete this App for each bowel movement.
Purpose of survey:
To accurately and more completely record each subject’s bowel and stooling habit 
To better understand the subject’s constipation problem 
To use the information to improve the health of a patient with constipation
Benefits to the Respondent:
To improve diagnosis of constipation and to identify the subject’s subtype of constipation
To help develop appropriate treatment plan
To help develop new treatments

title: Secret Diary
description:
Do you love writing a beautiful diary daily? Are you looking for a very simple and easy way to use diary app? Secret Diary is made for You! Here you go, the Secret Diary fulfills it all!

❤ SECRET DIARY ❤ is a wonderful personal diary that allows you to organize everyday your life. It is also a strictly private diary which lets you lock your secrets with a password. All your secrets, feelings, thoughts, experiences and memories can be organized and managed in this single app. Use texts, pictures, notes and stickers to record the best moments of your private life!
Secret Diary is a very simple application to use which lets you write daily thoughts, ideas and memories with a simple user interface. Add a visual touch to your memories also attaching photos. Use all possible pictures, texts and audio notes that reflect your mood. Once you saved your data nobody can hack even you lost your phone!

★★ FEATURED FUNCTIONS★★

☛ PASSWORD & LOCK
✓ Set up a password to protect your secrets
✓ Change the password and settings of your secret password
✓ Possibility to enable and disable password

☛ DIARY ENTRIES MANAGEMENT 
✓ Create, modify and delete a diary entry in a very simple way
✓ Diaries in daily view (soon calendar view, and list view)
✓ Daily view: manage a diary entry for a specific date, including:
    - Rate your day giving from 1 to 5 hearts (including full hearts and also half hearts)
    - Select private diary emoticons for each entry
    - Attach pictures or photos to a journal entry (taken via camera or selected from your gallery)
    - Slide the screen left or right to view neighboring diary entries
    - Diary entries are auto saved when you exit
    - You can add music for each note and listen music while you are writing notes.

❤ CUSTOMIZATIONS
✓ Multilingual UI in 10 languages (and we’re developing more and more language translations…)
✓ Different backgrounds available (some colors and some customized…)
✓ Different papers available (some colors and some customized sheets texture…)
✓ Possibility to adjust the level transparency of the sheets
✓ Different wonderful fonts available 
✓ Modification of the font size, color and style
✓ Reminder functionality by notification (with time and daily set up customizable)
✓ Wonderful splashscreen (soon customizable)

☛ BACKUPS & RESTORE
✓ Backup your diaries to SD card
✓ Restore your diaries from SD card

☛ HOW TO CONTACT SECRET DIARY
If you have any kind of problem or suggestions about using this cute app, please use the Help Screen of the App or email us to support@ennesoft.com. We will reply to you as soon as possible.

★ Please, if is possible, rate SECRET DIARY and give us your feedback! ★

Enjoy and have fun! Play & enjoy with your friends and share all you want of "SECRET DIARY" on Facebook, WhatsApp, Twitter, Email, SMS and so on!

✓ Wonderful splashscreen (soon customizable)

☛ BACKUPS & RESTORE

✓ Restore your diaries from SD card

If you have any kind of problem or suggestions about using this cute app, please use the Help Screen of the App or email us to support@ennesoft.com. We will reply to you as soon as possible.

★ Please, if is possible, rate SECRET DIARY and give us your feedback! ★

Enjoy and have fun! Play & enjoy with your friends and share all you want of "SECRET DIARY" on Facebook, WhatsApp, Twitter, Email, SMS and so on!

title: Sleep Cycle: Sleep analysis & Smart alarm clock
description:
Relax, sleep better and wake up feeling rested with Sleep Cycle, the smart alarm clock. Track sleep from bedtime to morning, and get detailed analysis with the app that makes waking up in the morning just that bit easier. 

Track sleep using your phone and start your day feeling energized with our intelligent alarm clock and sleep tracker. Its unique design only wakes you up while you’re in your light sleep phase. Plus, you’ll get detailed reports as Sleep Cycle monitors your sleep patterns, from bedtime until you're waking up. Track sleep and use the data to help you sleep better today! 

⏰ Waking up made easy - 5 reasons you’ll love Sleep Cycle:

1. Sleep better with a gentle wake up call - Sleep Cycle’s alarm clock wakes you up while you’re in light sleep and is a natural way to start your day.
2. Relax at bedtime and track sleep easily - Learn about your sleep patterns with detailed analysis. 
3. A sleep tracker with a difference - There’s no phone under your pillow, you can track sleep by placing your device on the nightstand or close by on the floor. 
4. Your health comes first - Your sleep data and reports will help you feel great inside and out. 
5. Sleep better - Relax and let Sleep Cycle analyse your light sleep, deep sleep and overall health.

Relax with a good night’s sleep that will do wonders for your health. 

Download Sleep Cycle today - waking up in the morning has never been easier! 

Free features

√ Sleep analysis with Sleep Cycle patented sound technology, or accelerometer
√ Detailed sleep statistics and daily sleep graphs
√ Carefully selected alarm melodies
√ Snooze by shaking or double tapping the phone lightly
√ Customizable wake-up window. From instant (regular alarm clock), up to 90 minutes

Premium features

√ Longterm sleep tracker trends
√ Compare your sleep data to world sleep statistics • Snore trends - view historical snore trends data
√ Sleep aid - helps you fall asleep easier
√ Sleep notes - see how events such as drinking coffee, stress, working out, or eating late affect your sleep quality
√ Wake up mood - see how Sleep Cycle affects your wake up mood
√ Online backup - lets you secure your sleep data online
√ Export sleep data to Excel for detailed analysis


REQUIREMENTS
Ability to charge your phone by the bed.
Ability to place your phone near the bed, such as on a nightstand table or on the floor.

recentChanges: Bug fixes and improvements.
comments: I love the sleep tracker feature on this! I upgraded just to accurately record my sleep and it has improved over time. One feature I wish it could do in the tracker is combine different sleep sessions in same day. For example, I like to take a 30min nap during lunch break. Sometimes at night, I am woken up to take dog out, or use the facilities. When I stop and restart it, it only records the most recent session.

Doesn't always record analysis. Some mornings you turn the alarm off (the alarm that is part of this app) and it simply does nothing instead of displaying your sleep record. It seems random as to when it works. In particular when you turn the alarm off and it goes to snooze (another glitch) it fails to record.

I benefited from this app a few years ago and need to do this again. Why did it switch from accelerometer to microphone? How will it know if I've stopped breathing or just changed sides? The accelerometer was way cool.

The microphone tracking is a great idea and seems well implemented, but there are two issues that baffle me that are easily fixed: 1) I often wake up early and want to know if I've gotten enough sleep. Show me. Why make me remember what time I went to bed and calculate? 2) It knows when I'm awake or asleep based on the microphone data so why doesn't it subtract out the time I was not sleeping? "In bed" time should be a second, less-important metric. Time actually asleep is more important.

It works. Its got a well designed UX. It really helps people with disorders such as ADHD where following a regular routine is important, but regular alarms are too discordant. I like the fact that the upgrade screen is at the beginning. The design is Honest. So all in all, well done.

title: Diary with lock , Note Book, Journal, Voice Notes
description:
Everyone's life journey and memories matters. We provide you a better way to document it using our diary. You can use this diary for note keeping. A pocket diary that will help you save your life moments and important achievements. Diary allows you to journal your life and its intricacies. Write or voice note your thoughts and important ideas that are worth saving, in-order to work on later. You can also use this diary as a personal note taking app of all the daily events, upcoming appointments, your secrets and your moods. 

Diary can be your mood tracker as well. Write about your moods and thoughts that bothers you to better manage your self. If you are a student, you can also write about what you learn in your class to better prepare for your exams. 

Diary can help you manage your forgetfulness, if you have a habit of forgetting import tasks then this diary app is best suitable for you. 

Diary is intended to be used to save your day to day activities. Write about your day and the things you love or hate and save it in this diary to go through it, later. Diary features includes Secret Lock, which allows you to password protect your entries. 

Diary allows you to save your pictures locally, along with title & description. This diary could be your journal to write about your favorite topics and things that interest you. 

In this Diary app, all of your data such as entries, pictures & audio recordings etc are stored locally so you're always in charge of your data. Nothing is stored on the servers.

 You can use this diary app to write about your crush or nemesis. This could prove to be fun memory when you later revisit your old entries. 

If you are not in a mood to write, just record it or take picture.

*Features
. Secret Lock
. Multiple personalized themes to change background
. You can save Pictures & Audio Recordings
. You can backup and Restore your Data

comments: I just downloaded this because I'm interested the photo/video/voice recorder features. But when I was trying to upload a photo, it always force closed, and every time I pick report, it always comes to login page. I have tried to write today's diary more than 10 times. But all failed. Only once succeeded, that was when I forgot to insert the photo. And it cannot be edited! And the voice recorder is very bad.. too fast and unlistenable. So annoying! Uninstall.

I really like the input screen, where you can add text, sounds, photos so easily! What i would need in order to give it 5 stars is: the ability to login with an account like google or facebook, save my backups automatically in google drive for example, and be able to pay in order to get rid of the ads.

Oh Good God this app. It actually cute at first. I wanted a dream journal in which I could record audio too, since typing can sometimes be tiring. But oh good god is this app bad. It crashes, every five minutes, and anything you touch, a loud, obnoxious add pops up. I'll never install this again, because oh lord is this app a bad one.

I just sat there and recorded half an hour of audio and I thought if I pressed the mic button, as there is no pause recording button, it would pause the recording. And I did that multiple times. So from the half an hour I kept rambling about my day it only saved the last about 5 minutes or so. Thanks

Dairy with Lock note book app is great. A pocket diary that will help you save your life moments and important achievements.Write or voice note your thoughts and important ideas that are worth saving, in-order to work on later. You can also use this diary as a personal note

title: My Journal - The perfect journal
descriptionHTML:
The notes of your life are very important and therefore deserve a special place to be kept and remembered, with our diary you have access to them, and has many features to record your way.

This new diary app, in addition to having several features, is constantly improving, so you can count on innovative ways to record your story with a team that grows with you.

We highlight some benefits of the app:

EASY TO USE
- adding, editing and removing records, including past and future;
- adding, removing and viewing images with a gallery;
- adding emojis of feelings about daily records;
- visualization of all records in an ordered timeline;
- beautiful and pleasant design;

SECURE AND PRIVATE
- only you have access to your diary;
- 4-digit PIN code;
- password recovery functionality;
- auto block after 30 minutes of inactivity.

PERSONALIZED
- changing colors;
- change of source.

TALK TO US AND HELP US TO IMPROVE
We are always looking to improve and add new features, so your opinion is very important to us.
- Get in touch with customer service on the app;
- Twitter: @ f2acode
summary: Your diary, easy to use, beautiful and always improving!

title: Hay Day
description:
Best. Farm. Ever. Welcome to Hay Day, the most popular farming game on mobiles and tablets, number one in 122 countries.

Learn the lay of the land, tend to your crops, and trade goods with neighbors and friends. It’s a real special place where the crops never die even though it never rains. Sharing the farm with our quirky animals only makes things more fun!

PLEASE NOTE! Hay Day is free to download and install. However, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. A network connection is also required.

~~~~~~~~~~
FEATURES
~~~~~~~~~~
♥ Grow and customize your farm
♥ Trade crops and fresh goods with neighbors and friends through your very own roadside shop
♥ Fulfill orders with your truck and even by steamboat
♥ Repair your dock and cast your lure to fish the waters
♥ Build your own town and welcome visitors

~~~~~~~~~~~
MEDIA MENTIONS
~~~~~~~~~~~

Hay Day‘s presentation is fairly cinematic for a mobile game. It’s eye candy. [...] If you’re a fan of simulation games, Hay Day is visually pleasing and will definitely keep your inner agriculturalist giddy for hours

http://www.gamezebo.com/2012/07/03/hay-day-review/

Watching your crops grow and your twee factories spew out products is a quietly pleasing experience.

http://www.pocketgamer.co.uk/r/Multiformat/Hay+Day/review.asp?c=42764

~~~~~~~~~~~
PLAYER REVIEWS
~~~~~~~~~~~

Hay Day is very proud to announce over 5 million five star reviews on Google Play! 

~~~~~~~~~~
SUPPORT
~~~~~~~~~~

Neighbor, are you having problems? Visit https://supercell.helpshift.com/a/hay-day/?l=en or contact us in game by going to Settings > Help and Support.

Under our Terms of Services and Privacy Policy, Hay Day is allowed for download and play only for persons 13 years or over of age.

Privacy Policy:
http://www.supercell.net/privacy-policy/

Terms of Service:
http://www.supercell.net/terms-of-service/

Parent's Guide:
http://www.supercell.net/parents/

comments: This game is great, and I love to play it, but two things really get on my nerves, 1 definately more important than number 2. 1: Crashing. Every 5-8 minutes of playing the music will start to cut out (every single time it crashes) and then the game will close/crash. I have, so far, only seen 1 other review for crashes. 2: Slow pace. I don't like how slow the game progresses, it seems that it takes FOREVER to get the the next level, especially the more levels you climb, but that's just me.

Edit: servers are undergoing maintenance, apparently. This is the first time this has happened for me without a notification popping up. Sigh. The game refuses to connect to the server despite me being on WiFi. It simply says "unable to connect to server, check your connection". I have checked, and my connection is fine. Please fix this. It's one thing to lose out on bonuses after activating boosters if I forget to log in, but another if I'm prevented from logging in altogether.

Game crashes too easily nd issue is almost 50% reproducible. Suddenly, the application gets stuck and stops. Would like to have this fixed. Also, I have noticed sometimes, it gets blocked in a place for a few seconds probably 1 or 2 which always doesn't end up in an ANR but yes there is a big issue in this that the app crashes frequently

This game is great i used to play it a while back and i recently started to get back into it, one main issue thats REALLY ticking me off is the nonstop crashing of the game. I don't remember this being this bad and as i read through the comments on the reports I'm not the only one please do your best to fix this issue

This is a great game, I love supercell but there is a problem for the S9. ( well it happens to me) So I will be playing the game and collecting my crops, then I will put stuff on sale, then I would start to create things. But no matter what I do the game crashes every single time I play it, I know it's not my phone with supercell games because I have clash of clans and it doesn't crash at all. It's only hay day that crashes so supercell please fix this and I will give you a five star review!

title: WhiteCoat
description:
Use WhiteCoat and connect with Singapore-registered doctors via live video. Receive quality healthcare in just a matter of minutes, eliminate clinic waiting times, and enjoy medication delivered to your doorstep, wherever you are*.

WhiteCoat is a telemedicine provider in the Ministry of Health Singapore’s regulatory sandbox.

• Download the WhiteCoat app and register yourself or your child^
• Select your doctor or have one assigned to you to begin your video consult
• Receive your diagnosis, medical certificate (MC) or referral letter (where medically necessary) promptly*
• Arrange for same day island-wide delivery of prescribed medication to your doorstep**
• Access your medical documents and medical history at any time

WhiteCoat provides medical attention for most common acute and chronic medical conditions, including:

• Flu, cough, cold, or sore throat
• Fever, or headache
• Diarrhoea, constipation, or vomiting
• Rash, or cold sores
• Eye issues
• Urinary tract infection
• Asthma, or acute bronchitis
• Dermatological conditions
• Diabetes
• High blood pressure
• High cholesterol

We can also provide you with advice regarding your latest laboratory results or sexual health.

^ Persons below 16 can only be treated if accompanied by a parent/guardian during the video consult
* If your doctor determines that you are unsuitable for a video consult, you will be advised to seek appropriate follow-up actions for continuity of care before ending the session. You will not be charged a consult fee. 
**Service currently available in Singapore only
